**Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Nail Polish Topcoat 001** is a 100% vegan nail polish from Bourjois, from its formula to its brush. Clean beauty and superior care with a chic French touch. â­ Contains 77% natural ingredients. â­ Free from 16 nasties, including sulfates, acetone, and phthalates. â­ Delivers intense, shiny color that lasts up to 5 days. â­ Quick-drying and easy to apply. â­ Panoramic brush for perfect coverage in one stroke. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Nail Polish Topcoat 001**: â­ Apply one coat to clean, dry nails. â­ Allow to dry completely before applying a second coat, if desired. â­ For best results, use a Bourjois base and top coat.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Nail Polish Topcoat 001**: â­ 77% natural ingredients. â­ Free from sulfates, acetone, phthalates, and other harmful substances.

description_en:
**Bourjois Contour Velvet Perfect Date Lip Liner** is your new go-to lip liner! It gives you precise and natural lip definition. â­ Enriched with Shea butter and grape seed oil for ultimate comfort. â­ Easy application with a creamy matte texture. â­ Long-lasting color that keeps your lipstick in place for 8 hours. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Contour Velvet Perfect Date Lip Liner**:
â­ Apply color to the center of the upper and lower lip.
â­ Blend color from the outer corners towards the center.
â­ For extra shine, use lip gloss.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Contour Velvet Perfect Date Lip Liner**:
â­ ISODODECANE, C9-12 ALKANE, POLYETHYLENE, BIS-CARBOXYDECYL DIMETHICONE, PHENYL TRIMETHICONE, OZOKERITE, COCOCAPRYLATE/CAPRATE, HDI/TRIMETHYLOL HEXYLLACTONE CROSSPOLYMER, TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE, QUATERNIUM-90 SEPIOLITE, PHENOXYETHANOL, TRIETHOXYCAPRYLYLSILANE, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, UNDECYLENIC ACID, QUATERNIUM-90 MONTMORILLONITE, SILICA, PARFUM/FRAGRANCE, LINALOOL, HYDROXYCITRONELLAL, HEXYL CINNAMAL, BHT, Peut Contenir/+/-: MICA, D&C RED NO. 7 CALCIUM LAKE (CI 15850), IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891), D&C RED NO. 6 BARIUM LAKE (CI 15850), FD&C YELLOW NO. 5 ALUMINUM LAKE (CI 19140), FD&C YELLOW NO. 6 ALUMINUM LAKE (CI 15985),FD&C BLUE NO. 1 ALUMINUM LAKE (CI 42090).

**Bourjois Contour Edition T10 Bordeaux Line** - achieve a flawless lip look! â­ Enriched with shea butter and grape seed oil for ultimate comfort. â­ Smooth, gliding texture provides a perfect line that lasts up to 12 hours. â­ Prevents lipstick bleeding or feathering. â­ Available in 12 stunning shades. â­ Perfect for all lipstick colors.

**Bourjois Eyeshadow Palette Glamour 03** - This multicolor eyeshadow palette is perfect for creating stunning makeup looks. It features 6 ultra-pigmented shades with a smooth, creamy texture that's easy to apply and lasts all day long. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Eyeshadow Palette Glamour 03**:
â­ Apply the lightest shade as a base all over the eyelid.
â­ Apply the medium shade to the outer corner of the eye to intensify the look.
â­ Use the darkest shade along the lash line for definition.
â­ Create your own unique look with the multiple shade options.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Eyeshadow Palette Glamour 03**:
Mica, talc, dimethicone, caprylic/capric triglyceride, magnesium stearate, phenoxyethanol, cocos nucifera (coconut) oil, caprylyl glycol, synthetic fluorphlogopite, aloe barbadensis leaf extract, alumina, triethoxycaprylylsilane, tinoxide, [may contain/may contain/+/-:iron oxides (ci 77491, ci 77492, ci 77499), titanium dioxide (ci 77891), ultramarines (ci 77007),manganese violet (ci 77742), carmine (ci 75470), d&c red no. 30 lake (ci 73360), d&c red no.7 calcium lake (ci 15850)].

**Bourjois Always Fabulous Foundation 24H - Light - Ivory**: Stay fabulous for 24 hours with this high-coverage foundation boasting a smooth, semi-matte finish. description_en:
**Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Foundation - 58 Caramel** gives you a naturally radiant complexion without compromising on coverage. This liquid foundation brightens and evens your skin tone with a healthy mix of Vitamins C, E, and B5. It provides intense hydration that lasts all day long.  The lightweight, vegan formula is made with 85% natural ingredients and is available in 22 beautiful shades. Offering buildable coverage, it conceals imperfections and enhances your complexion. Enjoy your day with confidence! Bourjois, a renowned French brand, embodies Parisian beauty for 160 years.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Foundation - 58 Caramel**: 
â­ Apply all over the face using a brush or sponge. 
â­ Focus on the T-zone, blending outwards for a radiant and flawless finish. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Foundation - 58 Caramel**: 
â­ Aqua/Water/Eau, Dicaprylyl Ether, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Glycerin, Corn Starch Modified, Isododecane, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Sodium Chloride, etc. (For full ingredient list, see product packaging).

description_en:
**Bourjois Healthy Mix Serum Foundation 51.2 Golden Vanilla 30 ml** is a luxurious foundation enriched with a vegan formula containing 82% ingredients of natural origin. It combines the benefits of a serum with the coverage of a liquid foundation. Easy to apply, it glides smoothly onto the skin, concealing minor imperfections, providing an even tone, smoothness, and a natural radiance. Enriched with cranberry extract, rich in peptides and vitamins C, B5, and E, it moisturizes, nourishes, and firms the skin. It comes in an elegant bottle with a dropper.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Healthy Mix Serum Foundation 51.2 Golden Vanilla 30 ml**: 
â­ Apply an appropriate amount to the skin. 
â­ Spread evenly using a sponge or your fingers. 
â­ Apply more as needed for optimal coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Healthy Mix Serum Foundation 51.2 Golden Vanilla 30 ml**: 
â­ Aqua/Water/Eau, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Isododecane, 2,3-Butanediol, Glycerin, Polyglyceryl-4 Diisostearate/Polyhydroxystearate/Sebacate, Mica, Diisostearoyl Polyglyceryl-3 Dimer Dilinoleate, Sodium Chloride, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Boron Nitride, Saccharomyces Ferment, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Parfum/Fragrance, Tocopheryl Acetate, Trioctyldodecyl Citrate, Xanthan Gum, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Chlorphenesin, Propylene Carbonate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Panthenol, Lauroyl Lysine, Methicone, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Fruit Extract, Tocopherol, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Pantolactone, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499)].

**Bourjois Rouge Velvet Ink #025**, a matte liquid lip ink offering intense color and a hold up to 24 hours.  Its unique, thin applicator allows for precise application and flawless lips. The ultra-fluid, comfortable formula is transfer-proof and smudge-proof, even with a face mask.  Choose from 26 highly saturated shades for the perfect matte finish.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Rouge Velvet Ink #025**:
â­ Apply lipstick to the center of your upper and lower lips.
â­ Apply lipstick from the outer corners to the center of your upper and lower lips.
â­ You can apply lip gloss on top for extra shine and glamour.

description_en:
**Bourjois Khol & Contour Brown Wood #002** is a 2-in-1 kohl pencil: eyeliner & pencil with integrated mine trimmer that suits the eye contour and its interior for an effective and burr-free makeup. Its creamy and shiny formula offers an intense rendering and is easily applied thanks to its ultra-precise applicator. Waterproof and long-lasting, **Bourjois Khol & Contour Brown Wood #002** does not smudge and remains comfortable all day long!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Khol & Contour Brown Wood #002**:
â­ Suitable for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers.
â­ Ophthalmologically tested.
â­ Use eyeliner flush with the lower eyelashes to intensify and emphasize the eye contour.
â­ Apply the eyeliner on the level of the upper eyelashes to define the look.
â­ Complete the look with a waterproof Bourjois mascara for a long-lasting makeup result.
â­ For a better, more accurate application, use the integrated sharpener.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Khol & Contour Brown Wood #002**:
â­ DIMETHICONE
â­ SYNTHETIC WAX
â­ POLYMETHYLSILSESQUIOXANE
â­ LAUROYL LYSINE
â­ DIISOSTEARYL MALATE
â­ OCTYLDODECANOL
â­ ISODECYL NEOPENTANOATE
â­ DICALCIUM PHOSPHATE
â­ POLYHYDROXYSTEARIC ACID
â­ DISTEARDIMONIUM HECTORITE
â­ PROPYLENE CARBONATE
â­ LECITHIN
â­ TOCOPHEROL
â­ ASCORBYL PALMITATE
â­ CITRIC ACID
â­ [May Contain/May Contain/+/-: IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891), FERRIC AMMONIUM FERROCYANIDE (CI 77510), MICA, D&C BLACK NO. 2 [nano] (CI 77266), FD&C BLUE NO. 1 ALUMINUM LAKE (CI 42090)].

This anti-shine compact powder from Bourjois provides a flawless complexion. â­ Long-lasting melting formula. â­ Matte finish. â­ Ultra-coverage with a bare skin feel. â­ Absorbs excess sebum without drying the skin. â­ Perfect for use alone or over foundation.

This luxurious lip gloss from Bourjois is lightweight, non-sticky, and delivers a high-shine, long-lasting finish. â­ Infused with argan oil and vitamin E for all-day hydration. â­ A range of stunning colours for a unique look. â­ Easy and smooth application thanks to the precise applicator. â­ Leaves lips feeling soft and moisturized.

â­ POLYBUTENE, HYDROGENATED POLYISOBUTENE, PARAFFINUM LIQUIDUM/MINERAL OIL/HUILE MINERALE, ETHYLHEXYL PALMITATE, ETHYLENE/PROPYLENE/STYRENE COPOLYMER, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, PHENOXYETHANOL, PARFUM/FRAGRANCE, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, BUTYLENE/ETHYLENE/STYRENE COPOLYMER, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, ARGANIA SPINOSA KERNEL OIL, BENZYL ALCOHOL, LINALOOL, GERANIOL, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, CITRONELLOL, BHT

description_en:
**Bourjois Liner Pincel Rl2.5Ml #4 - Blue**, Bourjois' iconic brush eyeliner. â­ Intense color that lasts all day thanks to its long-lasting and waterproof formula. â­ Create perfectly modular curved lines, from the thinnest to the thickest. â­ Glossy finish that lasts up to 24 hours. â­ Ophthalmologically tested.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Liner Pincel Rl2.5Ml #4 - Blue**:
â­ Apply eyeliner from the center to the outer corner of the eyelid.
â­ Resume the line from the inner corner to the center of the eyelid.
â­ Extend the line to create a comma at the outer corner of the eye and add a few dots above the moving eyelid for a unique look.
â­ Complete the look with Bourjois volume mascara.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Liner Pincel Rl2.5Ml #4 - Blue**:
â­ AQUA/WATER/EAU, AMMONIUM ACRYLATES COPOLYMER, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, PENTYLENE GLYCOL, ALCOHOL DENAT., SYNTHETIC FLUORPHLOGOPITE, POLYSORBATE 20, DISODIUM DECETH-6 SULFOSUCCINATE, PHENOXYETHANOL, LAURETH-30, CELLULOSE GUM, MAGNESIUM ALUMINUM SILICATE, SILICA, SODIUM DEHYDROACETATE, TALC, PANTHENOL, TIN OXIDE, PANTOLACTONE,[May Contain/May Contain/+/-:MICA, IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499, CI 77499, CI 77499), TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891), ULTRAMARINES (CI 77007), CHROMIUM OXIDE GREENS (CI 77288), FD&C BLUE NO .1 ALUMINUM LAKE (CI 42090)].

description_en:
**Bourjois Lip Gloss Fabuleux 3 Rose Charismatic**, it's your time to shine with the new Fabuleux Lip Gloss from Bourjois. A long-lasting, high-shine, non-sticky and lightweight lip gloss in beautiful colours for instantly luscious lips. Its unique lip balm feel formula is infused with argan oil and vitamin E to keep lips hydrated for ultimate all-day wear comfort. Available in 9 shiny, beautiful colours and featuring an ultra-soft, precise applicator for a lip gloss that glides on easily.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Lip Gloss Fabuleux 3 Rose Charismatic**: 
â­ Apply **Bourjois Lip Gloss Fabuleux 3 Rose Charismatic** to the centre of the upper and lower lip.
â­ The soft, flocked, angled applicator delivers a precise finish that glides on easily with a single coat.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Lip Gloss Fabuleux 3 Rose Charismatic**:
â­ POLYBUTENE
â­ HYDROGENATED POLYISOBUTENE
â­ PARAFFINUM LIQUIDUM/MINERAL OIL/HUILE MINERALE
â­ ETHYLHEXYL PALMITATE
â­ ETHYLENE/PROPYLENE/STYRENE COPOLYMER
â­ ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE
â­ PHENOXYETHANOL
â­ PARFUM/FRAGRANCE
â­ TOCOPHERYL ACETATE
â­ BUTYLENE/ETHYLENE/STYRENE COPOLYMER
â­ BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE
â­ ARGANIA SPINOSA KERNEL OIL
â­ BENZYL ALCOHOL
â­ LINALOOL
â­ GERANIOL
â­ ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE
â­ CITRONELLOL
â­ BHT

description_en:
**Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Concealer - 58 Caramel**, achieve a healthy, radiant complexion with this innovative concealer! â­ Perfect coverage for blemishes, dark circles, and signs of fatigue. â­ Vegan formula enriched with vitamins (2.4 times more than our previous formulas!), for up to 24 hours of hydration. â­ Available in 9 shades to match all skin tones. â­ Clean formula, free of animal-derived ingredients. â­ Eco-friendly packaging made from recycled materials. â­ Gives you a natural, radiant look. â­ Easy to apply and blends seamlessly. â­ Ideal for everyday use. â­ Boosts your confidence all day long. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Concealer - 58 Caramel**: â­ Apply the concealer to dark circles and blemishes. â­ Blend gently using your fingertips or a brush. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Concealer - 58 Caramel**: â­ Aqua/Water/Eau, Corn Starch Modified, Dicaprylyl Ether, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Isododecane, Glycerin, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Silica, Sodium Chloride, TRI(POLYGLYCERYL3/LAURYL) HYDROGENATED TRILINOLEATE, Stearalkonium Bentonite, 2,3 Butanediol, Cetyl PEG/PPG10/1 Dimethicone, Mica, Propylene Carbonate, Parfum/Fragrance, Tocopherol, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Sodium Benzoate, Chlorphenesin, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Propylene Glycol, Panthenol, Methicone, Cucumis Melo (Melon) Fruit Extract, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Fruit Extract, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, Benzoic Acid, Sorbic Acid, Pentaerythrityl Tetraditbutyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)]

description_en:
**Bourjois Contour Clubbing Waterproof Sea Blue Soon T63** is a colorful, long-lasting, and waterproof eye pencil. Its ultra-soft texture glides smoothly along the lash line for an intense and vibrant effect. Once set, the color won't budge until removed with waterproof makeup remover. The formula, enhanced with jojoba and cotton oils, offers absolute comfort even for contact lens wearers. It can be used as a liner or smudged as eyeshadow. Make your eyes pop with one of the vibrant colors that won't run, crease, or fade. **Bourjois Contour Clubbing Waterproof Sea Blue Soon T63** is a must-have for your makeup collection.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Contour Clubbing Waterproof Sea Blue Soon T63**:
â­ Draw a thin diagonal line to the end of the wing.
â­ Make a straight line from the tip of the wing to the middle of your eyelid.
â­ Thicken the line at the inner eyelid.
â­ Fill in the outline.
â­ For a smoky look, smudge the color to apply as eyeshadow.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Contour Clubbing Waterproof Sea Blue Soon T63**:
â­ Jojoba oil
â­ Cotton oil
â­ Vitamin E

description_en:
**Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Powder** gives you a naturally radiant look without compromising coverage. It provides light to medium coverage, leaving you with a healthy, mattified, and radiant complexion. â­ Light to medium natural coverage. â­ Blurs pores. â­ Anti-fatigue. â­ 93% vegan formula with natural origin ingredients. â­ Enriched with Vitamins C, E, and B5. â­ Sets makeup for up to 10 hours. â­ Available in 8 shades. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Powder**: â­ Apply powder all over your face from the center, blending outwards with the sponge. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Powder**: â­ Mica, Kaolin, Zinc Stearate, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Flour, Isopropyl Palmitate, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Dimethicone, Lauroyl Lysine, Parfum/Fragrance, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Caprylyl Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Sodium Benzoate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Punica Granatum Fruit Juice, Euterpe Oleracea Juice, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Panthenol, Glycerin, Aqua/Water/Eau, Lycium Barbarum Fruit Extract, Pantolactone, Potassium Sorbate, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)].

description_en:
**Bourjois Twist Up The Volume** Blue Mascara (8ml) is a revolutionary mascara designed to deliver intense volume and length with a vibrant pop of blue color to your lashes.  Its innovative twist-up brush allows you to customize your lash look, achieving everything from natural definition to dramatic volume with ease.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Twist Up The Volume**: 
â­ Adjust the Brush: Twist the mascara wand to your preferred setting. 
â­ Apply: Start at the base of your lashes and wiggle the brush upwards. 
â­ Layer for Impact: Apply additional coats for extra volume. 
â­ Allow to Dry: Let it dry for a few moments. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Twist Up The Volume**: 
â­ Volume-Enhancing Polymers: For fuller-looking lashes. 
â­ Natural Waxes: For smooth application. 
â­ Color Pigments: For vibrant color.

description_en:
**Bourjois Clubbing Waterproof Pencil Loving Green**, a colorful, long-lasting, and waterproof eye pencil. Its ultra-soft texture glides smoothly along the lash line for an intense and vibrant effect. The color stays put until removed with waterproof makeup remover.  Its formula, enriched with jojoba and cotton oils, offers absolute comfort, even for contact lens wearers. It can be used as an eyeliner or eyeshadow. Make your eyes pop with vibrant colors that won't smudge, crease, or fade. **Bourjois Clubbing Waterproof Pencil Loving Green** is a must-have for your makeup bag.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Clubbing Waterproof Pencil Loving Green**:
â­ Draw a thin diagonal line to the end of the wing.
â­ Make a straight line from the tip of the wing to the middle of your eyelid.
â­ Thicken the line at the inner eyelid.
â­ Smudge the color for a smoky look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Clubbing Waterproof Pencil Loving Green**:
â­ Jojoba Oil
â­ Cotton Oil

#Bourjois #Eyeliner #Makeup #Beauty #Waterproof #Eyes #Kohl #BeautyTips #Riyadh #KSA

description_en:
**Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Powder**, achieve a naturally radiant look with perfect coverage! This mattifying face powder offers light to medium coverage for a healthy, radiant complexion. â­Offers anti-fatigue blurring. â­93% vegan formula with ingredients of natural origin. â­Enriched with Vitamins C, E, and B5. â­Sets makeup for up to 10 hours. â­Available in 8 shades.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Powder**: â­Apply powder all over the face from the center, blending outwards with a sponge for a perfect finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Powder**: â­Mica, Kaolin, Zinc Stearate, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Flour, Isopropyl Palmitate, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Dimethicone, Lauroyl Lysine, Parfum/Fragrance, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Caprylyl Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Sodium Benzoate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Punica Granatum Fruit Juice, Euterpe Oleracea Juice, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Panthenol, Glycerin, Aqua/Water/Eau, Lycium Barbarum Fruit Extract, Pantolactone, Potassium Sorbate, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)]

description_en:
**Bourjois Healthy Mix Serum Concealer Golden Beige** is a lightweight, illuminating concealer designed to effectively cover imperfections while enhancing your natural radiance.  Formulated with vitamins and hydrating ingredients, it provides excellent coverage for dark circles, blemishes, and uneven skin tone, leaving your skin looking refreshed and luminous.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Healthy Mix Serum Concealer Golden Beige**:
â­ Prepare Skin: Start with a clean and moisturized face.
â­ Apply: Use the applicator to place the concealer on areas needing coverage (under eyes, blemishes, or redness).
â­ Blend: Use your fingertips, a makeup sponge, or a brush to blend seamlessly.
â­ Set (Optional): For longer wear, set with a light dusting of translucent powder.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Healthy Mix Serum Concealer Golden Beige**:
â­ Vitamins C and E: Provide antioxidant protection and skin nourishment.
â­ Hydrating Agents: Help maintain skin moisture for comfortable wear.
â­ Color Pigments: Offer excellent coverage with seamless blending.

It contains vitamins and hydrating ingredients, providing excellent coverage for dark circles, blemishes, and uneven skin tone, leaving your skin looking refreshed and radiant.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Healthy Mix Serum Concealer - Light Vanilla**:
â­ Prepare Your Skin: Start with a clean and moisturized face.
â­ Apply: Use the applicator to place the concealer on areas needing coverage, such as under the eyes or on blemishes.
â­ Blend: Use your fingertips, a makeup sponge, or a brush to blend the product seamlessly into the skin.
â­ Set (Optional): For longer wear, lightly dust with translucent powder.

description_en:
**Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Concealer - 59 Amber**: Achieve a healthy, radiant complexion with **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Concealer - 59 Amber**. This concealer provides flawless coverage for imperfections, dark circles, and signs of fatigue. Its vegan formula, enriched with vitamins (2.4 times more than our previous concealers!), offers up to 24 hours of hydration. Available in nine shades to perfectly match your skin tone.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Concealer - 59 Amber**:
â­ Apply the concealer to dark circles and blemishes.
â­ Blend gently with your fingertips or a makeup brush.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Concealer - 59 Amber**:
â­Aqua/Water/Eau
â­Corn Starch Modified
â­Dicaprylyl Ether
â­Dicaprylyl Carbonate
â­Isododecane

description_en:
**Bourjois Healthy Mix Serum Concealer - Beige** is a lightweight, illuminating concealer designed to effortlessly cover imperfections while delivering a natural, radiant finish. Infused with vitamins and hydrating ingredients, this serum concealer helps brighten the skin, reducing the appearance of dark circles, blemishes, and uneven skin tone for a fresh, healthy look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Healthy Mix Serum Concealer - Beige**:
â­ Prepare Skin: Start with a clean and moisturized face.
â­ Apply: Use the applicator to place the concealer on areas that need coverage, such as under the eyes or on blemishes.
â­ Blend: Use your fingertips, a makeup sponge, or a brush to blend the product seamlessly into the skin.
â­ Set (Optional): For longer-lasting wear, set with a light dusting of translucent powder.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Healthy Mix Serum Concealer - Beige**:
â­ Vitamins C and E: Provide antioxidant protection and nourishment.
â­ Hydrating Agents: Help maintain skin moisture for a comfortable feel.
â­ Color Pigments: Deliver excellent coverage while blending smoothly.

description_en:
**Bourjois Contour Clubbing Waterproof Up And Brown** is a colorful, long-lasting, and waterproof eye pencil. Its ultra-soft texture glides effortlessly along the lash line for an intense and vibrant effect. The color stays put until removed with waterproof makeup remover.  The formula, enriched with jojoba and cotton oils, provides absolute comfort, even for contact lens wearers. It can be used as a liner or smudged as an eyeshadow. Make your eyes pop with its vibrant colors that won't run, crease, or fade. **Bourjois Contour Clubbing Waterproof Up And Brown** is a must-have for your makeup bag.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Contour Clubbing Waterproof Up And Brown**
â­ Draw a thin line along your upper lash line.
â­ Gently smudge the color using a brush or blending tool for a smoky look.
â­ Use it as a liner or eyeshadow as desired.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Contour Clubbing Waterproof Up And Brown**
â­ Jojoba Oils
â­ Cotton Oils
â­ Other ingredients to provide color, shine, and lasting power.

description_en:
**Brow Wax Effect Lamination - Clear** is a must-have brow product that provides a professional lamination effect without any added color.  Its transparent formula delivers strong hold, keeping your brows perfectly shaped and in place all day long. Ideal for those who want to enhance their natural brow shape while maintaining a clean, polished look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Brow Wax Effect Lamination - Clear**:
â­ Start with clean, dry brows.
â­ Use the applicator to brush the clear formula through your brows, following their natural shape.
â­ For added hold, apply a second layer as needed.
â­ Allow the product to set for a few moments for maximum hold.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Brow Wax Effect Lamination - Clear**:
â­ Wax Complex: Provides strong hold and shaping for brows.
â­ Hydrating Agents: Help maintain brow health while ensuring a smooth finish.

**Bourjois Contour Clubbing Waterproof -Berry Brown**, a versatile eye pencil designed for long-lasting wear and intense color.  Its waterproof formula glides on smoothly, allowing you to create precise lines or blend for a smoky effect. The rich berry brown shade adds depth and definition to your eyes. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Contour Clubbing Waterproof -Berry Brown**: 
â­ As Eyeliner: Apply directly along the upper or lower lash lines. 
â­ As Eyeshadow: Use on eyelids and blend. 
â­ For Lower Lash Line: Apply along the lower lash line. 
â­ Layer for More Intensity: Apply additional layers as desired. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Contour Clubbing Waterproof -Berry Brown**:

â­ Hydrating Agents: Smooth application. 
â­ Waxes: Waterproof and smudge-proof.

description_en:
**Bourjois Always Fabulous** Compact Powder - 300: Achieve Always Fabulous skin with this amazing powder. â­ 2-in-1 formula combining the coverage of a liquid foundation with the long-lasting wear of a powder. â­ Lightweight, skin-like matte finish. â­ Enriched with hyaluronic acid for hydration, Lipochroman for anti-pollution, and SPF20. â­ Available in 8 shades. â­ Luxurious compact with mirror & multi-use sponge. â­ Buildable coverage from medium to full. â­ Perfect for concealing imperfections and controlling shine.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Always Fabulous**:
â­ Medium coverage: use the flat side of the sponge. â­ Full coverage: use the fluffier side. â­ Smooth application: press powder onto skin, don't drag. â­ For dry skin: use a setting spray.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Always Fabulous**: â­ MICA, ZINC OXIDE, KAOLIN, ZINC STEARATE, DIMETHICONE, BUTYLOCTYL SALICYLATE, BORON NITRIDE, TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE, SACCHAROMYCES FERMENT, SILICA, TRIETHOXYCAPRYLYLSILANE, 1,2-HEXANEDIOL, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, SODIUM BENZOATE, METHICONE, ALUMINA, LAUROYL LYSINE, PARFUM/FRAGRANCE, SODIUM HYALURONATE, HYDROGEN DIMETHICONE, DIMETHYLMETHOXY CHROMANOL, BENZYL SALICYLATE, [MAY CONTAIN/PEUT CONTENIR/+/-: TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891), IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)].

description_en:
**Bourjois Gloss Fabuleux** delivers irresistible shine and luxurious hydration! â­ Infused with argan oil and vitamin E for 24-hour hydration. â­ Features a soft, angled precision applicator for effortless application. â­ Available in a range of vibrant shades. â­ Leaves lips feeling soft, smooth, and luscious. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Gloss Fabuleux**: 
â­ Apply gloss to the center of your upper and lower lips. 
â­ Glide the gloss evenly using the applicator. 
â­ Use a single coat for a natural look, or layer for a more intense finish. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Gloss Fabuleux**: 
â­ Polybutene, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Paraffinum Liquidum/Mineral Oil/Huile Minerale, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Lanolin Oil, Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Polyethylene, Phenoxyethanol, Silica, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Parfum/Fragrance, Tocopheryl Acetate, Butylene/Ethylene/Styrene Copolymer, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Benzyl Alcohol, Linalool, Geraniol, Tin Oxide, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Citronellol, Bht.

â­ Synthetic Wax
â­ and many other premium ingredients for a luxurious experience.

description_en:
**Bourjois Contour Edition T09 Plum It Up 09** - the secret to a flawless lip look!  **Bourjois Contour Edition T09 Plum It Up 09** boasts an ultra-smooth, blendable texture and comfortable wear that lasts up to 12 hours. It delivers an undetectable perfecting line and prevents lipstick bleeding or feathering. Available in 12 shades.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Contour Edition T09 Plum It Up 09**:
â­ Line your lips, starting at the cupid's bow, drawing the outer corners and the middle of your lower lip.
â­ Use small strokes to connect the lines and outline the entire edge of your lips.
â­ Blend the lip contour with a lip brush from the edge of the lips towards the center.
â­ Apply lipstick in a matching color.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Contour Edition T09 Plum It Up 09**:
â­ Shea Butter
â­ Grape Seed Oil

description_en:
**Bourjois Clubbing Waterproof Pencil Bleu NÃ©on**, a vibrant neon waterproof eyeliner. â­ Creates a stunning, long-lasting eye look. â­ Its ultra-soft texture glides effortlessly along the lash line. â­ Smudge-proof and fade-resistant. â­ Enriched with jojoba and cotton oils for ultimate comfort, even for contact lens wearers. â­ Can be used as a liner or eyeshadow. â­ Available in a range of vibrant colors. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Clubbing Waterproof Pencil Bleu NÃ©on**: 
â­ Draw a thin diagonal line towards the end of your wing. 
â­ Make a straight line from the tip of the wing to the middle of your eyelid. 
â­ Thicken the line at the inner eyelid. 
â­ Fill in the outline. 
â­ For a smoky look, smudge the color to apply the pencil as an eyeshadow. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Clubbing Waterproof Pencil Bleu NÃ©on**: 
â­ Jojoba Oil â­ Cotton Oil â­ Other Ingredients

**Bourjois Rouge Fabuleux 12** - Have a true Parisian rendezvous! Bold colors as intense as a Parisian night over the Seine. **Bourjois Rouge Fabuleux 12** is creamy, moisturizing, and delivers precise application. Soft and long-lasting, for a glamorous look that lasts. Enjoy your day with **Bourjois Rouge Fabuleux 12**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Rouge Fabuleux 12**
â­ Apply color to the center of your upper and lower lips.
â­ Blend color from the outer corners to the center of your upper and lower lips.
â­ Optionally, apply lip gloss over lipstick for extra shine.

description_en:
**Bourjois Healthy Mix Serum Concealer - Ivory**: A lightweight, illuminating concealer that effectively conceals imperfections while enhancing your natural glow. Enriched with vitamins and hydrating ingredients, it provides excellent coverage for dark circles, blemishes, and uneven skin tone, leaving your complexion looking fresh and radiant.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Healthy Mix Serum Concealer - Ivory**:
â­ Prep your skin: Start with a clean, moisturized face.
â­ Apply: Use the applicator to apply the concealer to areas needing coverage.
â­ Blend: Blend the concealer using your fingertips, a makeup sponge, or a brush.
â­ Set (Optional): Lightly dust with translucent powder for added longevity.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Healthy Mix Serum Concealer - Ivory**:
â­ Vitamins C and E: Offer antioxidant protection.
â­ Hydrating Agents: Maintain skin moisture.
â­ Color Pigments: Provide excellent coverage while blending smoothly into the skin.

**Bourjois Healthy Mix Lip Oil- Straw Bisous**, Lips as smooth as glass and as reflective as a mirror? This product can turn that dream into a reality. It envelops the lips in a high-gloss formula, smoothing and evening out their surface to mask any lines or wrinkles while giving your lips long-lasting comfort. It promotes their soft appearance, preventing dryness that can interfere with your perfect makeup look. In an instant, you'll achieve glossy, luscious lips that will be the center of attention.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Healthy Mix Lip Oil- Straw Bisous**:
â­ Apply with a gentle stroke to the lips, from the centre of the mouth to the corners.
â­ Repeat as necessary.
â­ Apply to clean, dry lips.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Healthy Mix Lip Oil- Straw Bisous**:
â­ Vegan product

Its waterproof formula glides on smoothly, providing intense pigmentation and a beautiful bronze shade. Perfect for nights out or any occasion where you need your makeup to stay put all day long.

description_en:
**Bourjois Nail Polish 1 Seconde T08 - Red**: Get a salon-smooth finish in just one second with this easy-to-apply nail polish.  Its gel-like formula, enriched with silicone, gives your nails the perfect curve and an ultra-glossy result. The fan-effect brush adapts to the size of each nail for an ultra-quick and neat application.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Nail Polish 1 Seconde T08 - Red**:
â­ Trim your nails.
â­ Wash, dry, and moisturize your hands.
â­ Remove excess moisture from your nails.
â­ Clean around your cuticles.
â­ Apply a base coat (optional) for better longevity.
â­ Shake the **Bourjois Nail Polish 1 Seconde T08 - Red** bottle well before use.
â­ Apply a thin coat and let it dry for 5 minutes.
â­ Add a second coat for more vibrant color (optional).
â­ Clean the sides of your nails with an acetone-soaked cotton ball.

description_en:
**Bourjois Gentle Nail Polish Remover**: Pamper your nails with **Bourjois Gentle Nail Polish Remover**, a gentle yet effective way to remove nail polish in a single swipe, thanks to its acetone-free formula. It keeps your nails moisturized without drying them out, leaving a refreshing vanilla and red fruit scent.  It removes polish effectively without leaving any sticky or oily residue. A perfect addition to your nail care kit.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Gentle Nail Polish Remover**:
â­ Rub the cotton pad back and forth across the nail.
â­ Use a fresh cotton pad for each nail to remove any residue.
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly with soap and water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Gentle Nail Polish Remover**:
â­ Ethyl Acetate
â­ Isopropyl Myristate
â­ Parfum (Fragrance)
â­ Panthenol
â­ Tocopheryl Acetate
â­ Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil
â­ Hexyl Cinnamal

description_en:
**Bourjois Nail Polish 1 Seconde T04 - Nude** is easy and quick to apply, giving your nails a smooth finish in one second. Its one-coat gel formula, enriched with silicon, provides nails with a perfect curve and ultra-glossy shine. The brush adapts to the size of each nail for a neat and quick result.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Nail Polish 1 Seconde T04 - Nude**:
â­ Trim your nails.
â­ Wash, dry, and moisturize your hands.
â­ Wipe excess moisture from nails.
â­ Clean cuticles.
â­ Apply a base coat (optional) for longer lasting polish.
â­ Shake the bottle well before use.
â­ Apply a thin layer of **Bourjois Nail Polish 1 Seconde T04 - Nude** and let it dry for 5 minutes.
â­ Add a second coat if desired.
â­ Clean the sides of the nails with an acetone-soaked cotton ball after drying.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Nail Polish 1 Seconde T04 - Nude**:
â­ Silicon
â­ Color Pigments
â­ Other Ingredients (Specific ingredients may vary by shade. Please refer to the product packaging for a full list.)

description_en:
**Bourjois Nail Polish 1 SECONDE T07** is easy and quick to apply, giving your nails a smooth finish in just one second. Its one-coat gel formula, enriched with silicon, provides the perfect curve and ultra-glossy result. The fan-effect brush adapts to each nail size for a quick and neat application. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Nail Polish 1 SECONDE T07**:
â­ Trim your nails.
â­ Wash, dry, and moisturize your hands.
â­ Wipe off excess moisture with a tissue.
â­ Clean cuticles with damp cotton.
â­ Apply a base coat (optional).
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Apply a thin coat and let it dry for 5 minutes.
â­ Add a second coat (optional).
â­ Clean nail sides with acetone-soaked cotton.

description_en:
**Bourjois 1 Sec French Riviera Nail Polish 56 Botanic Chic** gives you a stylish mani-pedi with 6 new shades inspired by the Mediterranean coast. Get a quick-drying nail polish in just 60 seconds for the best nail polish result. The limited-edition bottle with an elegant gold cap echoes the glamour of the French Riviera. Bourjois is a renowned cosmetics brand empowering women and inspiring them to have fun with makeup.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois 1 Sec French Riviera Nail Polish 56 Botanic Chic**:
â­ Choose your favorite nail polish shade. 
â­ Apply one coat to your nails. 
â­ Wait 60 seconds to dry. 
â­ Apply a second coat if desired.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois 1 Sec French Riviera Nail Polish 56 Botanic Chic**:
â­ Butyl Acetate â­ Ethyl Acetate â­ Nitrocellulose â­ Adipic Acid/ Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer â­ Acetyl Tributyl Citrate â­ Isopropyl Alcohol â­ Acrylates Copolymer â­ Stearalkonium Bentonite â­ Aqua/Water/Eau â­ N-Butyl Alcohol â­ Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride â­ Silica â­ Diacetone Alcohol â­ Alcohol â­ Hexanal â­ Trimethylpentanediyl Dibenzoate â­ Kaolin â­ Pistacia Lentiscus (Mastic) Gum Oil â­ Phosphoric Acid â­ Dimethicone â­ Trimethylsiloxysilicate â­ Tocopheryl Acetate â­ Lithothamnion Calcareum Extract â­ Mannitol â­ Solum Diatomeae/Diatomaceous Earth/Terre De Diatomees â­ Tocopherol â­ Zinc Sulfate, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: Mica, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Yellow 5 Lake (Ci 19140), Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide (Ci 77510), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Red 7 Lake (Ci 15850), Red 6 Lake (Ci 15850), Yellow 11 (Ci 47000)].

**Bourjois 1 Sec French Riviera Nail Polish 52 Kiss Du** delivers a stylish and modern manicure. Inspired by the Mediterranean coast, **Bourjois 1 Sec French Riviera Nail Polish 52 Kiss Du** provides a captivating, long-lasting color.  Its unique formula dries in just 60 seconds, and the panoramic brush ensures a flawless application. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois 1 Sec French Riviera Nail Polish 52 Kiss Du**:
â­ Apply one coat of **Bourjois 1 Sec French Riviera Nail Polish 52 Kiss Du** to your nails.
â­ Wait 60 seconds to dry.
â­ Apply a second coat for more intense color.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois 1 Sec French Riviera Nail Polish 52 Kiss Du**:
â­ Butyl Acetate
â­ Ethyl Acetate
â­ Nitrocellulose
â­ Adipic Acid/ Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer
â­ Acetyl Tributyl Citrate
â­ and other ingredients listed in the full description.

description_en:
**Bourjois Nail Polish 1 SECONDE T14** is an easy and quick to apply nail polish that gives your nails a smooth finish in just one second. Its one-coat gel formula enriched with silicon gives nails the perfect curve and an ultra-glossy result. The fan-effect brush adapts to the size of each nail for a neat and quick result. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Nail Polish 1 SECONDE T14**:
â­ Trim your nails.
â­ Wash, dry, and moisturize your hands.
â­ Wipe off excess moisture.
â­ Clean cuticles.
â­ Apply a base coat (optional).
â­ Shake the bottle well.
â­ Apply a thin coat and let it dry for 5 minutes.
â­ Add a second coat (optional).
â­ Clean nail sides when dry.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Nail Polish 1 SECONDE T14**:
(Ingredients may vary by shade. Please see packaging for full ingredient list.)

description_en:
**Bourjois Fabuleux Gel Nail Polish 340 Berry Paris - Red Deep - 9 ml** Get fabulous nails in just two steps! Dress your nails in intense, glossy gel-effect colors for salon-quality results at home, without a UV lamp. Rediscover the joy of caring for your nails with **Fabuleux** nail polish, its deliciously scented, long-lasting formula offering up to 10 days of resistance. It's gelatinous, it's wonderful, it's **Fabuleux**: indulgence at your fingertips!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Fabuleux Gel Nail Polish 340 Berry Paris - Red Deep - 9 ml**
â­ Apply one coat of **Fabuleux** polish.
â­ Let it dry before applying a second coat.
â­ Apply one coat of top coat for extended wear and a high-shine finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Fabuleux Gel Nail Polish 340 Berry Paris - Red Deep - 9 ml**
â­ Ethyl Acetate, Butyl Acetate, Nitrocellulose, Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer, Acetyl Tributyl Citrate, Isopropyl Alcohol, Stearalkonium Bentonite, HEA/IPDI Isocyanurate Trimer/PG Crosspolymer, Parfum/Fragrance, n-Butyl Alcohol, Silica, Kaolin, Diacetone Alcohol, Limonene, Hexanal, Sorbic Acid, Aqua/Water/Eau, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/IPDI/PPG-15 Glyceryl Ether Copolymer, Lithothamnion Calcareum Extract, Alcohol, Phosphoric Acid, Mannitol, Glycolic Acid, Alpha- Isomethyl Ionone, Solum Diatomeae/Diatomaceous Earth/Terre de Diatomees, Malic Acid, Lactic Acid, Zinc Sulfate, Tocopherol, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Red 6 Lake (CI 15850), Red 34 Lake (CI 15880), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140)].

description_en:
**Bourjois 1 Sec French Riviera Nail Polish 53 Easy Peachy** gives you a stylish and modern manicure with this stunning nail polish. Achieve a charming Riviera look that lasts.  **Bourjois 1 Sec French Riviera Nail Polish 53 Easy Peachy** provides perfect coverage in just one coat, with a quick-drying time of 60 seconds. Enjoy a flawless manicure that lasts. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois 1 Sec French Riviera Nail Polish 53 Easy Peachy**:
â­ Apply one coat of **Bourjois 1 Sec French Riviera Nail Polish 53 Easy Peachy** to your clean nails.
â­ Wait 60 seconds for it to dry completely.
â­ You can apply a second coat for a more intense color.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois 1 Sec French Riviera Nail Polish 53 Easy Peachy**:
â­ Butyl Acetate
â­ Ethyl Acetate
â­ Nitrocellulose
â­ Adipic Acid/ Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer
â­ Acetyl Tributyl Citrate
â­ Isopropyl Alcohol
â­ and other safe and effective ingredients.

description_en:
**Bourjois Nail Polish 1 SECONDE T22** is easy and quick to apply, giving your nails a smooth finish in one second. Its one-coat gel formula, enriched with silicon, gives nails the perfect curve and ultra-glossy shine.  Its fan-effect brush adapts to the size of each nail for a quick and neat result.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Nail Polish 1 SECONDE T22**:
â­ Trim your nails.
â­ Wash, dry, and moisturize your hands.
â­ Wipe excess moisture from your nails.
â­ Clean the cuticles with a damp cotton ball.
â­ Apply a base coat (optional) for longer-lasting polish.
â­ Shake the **Bourjois Nail Polish 1 SECONDE T22** bottle well before use.
â­ Apply a thin coat and let it dry for 5 minutes.
â­ Add a second coat for more intense color (optional).
â­ Clean the sides of your nails with an acetone-soaked cotton ball after drying.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Nail Polish 1 SECONDE T22**:
(Ingredients may vary by shade; please refer to the packaging for a full list.)

**Bourjois Fabuleux Gel Nail Polish** delivers fabulous nails that last up to 10 days!  Its glossy gel formula boasts intense colors and professional results without a UV lamp. Easy to apply, with a refreshing scent and a panoramic brush to prevent spills. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Fabuleux Gel Nail Polish**:
â­ Apply one coat of **Bourjois Fabuleux Gel Nail Polish**, and let it dry.
â­ Apply a second coat for more intense color.
â­ Apply a top coat for a glossy and long-lasting finish. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Fabuleux Gel Nail Polish**:
â­ Ethyl Acetate, Butyl Acetate, Nitrocellulose, and other safe ingredients.

**Bourjois Fabuleux Gel Nail Polish 315 Cabaâ€™red** Get fabulous nails in just two steps! Dress your nails in intense, glossy gel-effect colors for salon-quality results at home, without a UV lamp. Rediscover the joy of caring for your nails with **Fabuleux nail polish**, its deliciously scented, long-lasting formula offering up to 10 days of resistance. It's gelatinous, it's wonderful, it's Fabuleux: indulgence at your fingertips!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Fabuleux Gel Nail Polish 315 Cabaâ€™red**
â­ Apply one coat of **Bourjois Fabuleux Gel Nail Polish 315 Cabaâ€™red**. Let it dry before applying a second coat.
â­ Apply one coat of top coat for extended wear and a high-shine finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Fabuleux Gel Nail Polish 315 Cabaâ€™red**
â­ Ethyl Acetate, Butyl Acetate, Nitrocellulose, Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer, Acetyl Tributyl Citrate, Isopropyl Alcohol, Stearalkonium Bentonite, HEA/IPDI Isocyanurate Trimer/PG Crosspolymer, Parfum/Fragrance, n-Butyl Alcohol, Silica, Kaolin, Diacetone Alcohol, Limonene, Hexanal, Sorbic Acid, Aqua/Water/Eau, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/IPDI/PPG-15 Glyceryl Ether Copolymer, Lithothamnion Calcareum Extract, Alcohol, Phosphoric Acid, Mannitol, Glycolic Acid, Alpha- Isomethyl Ionone, Solum Diatomeae/Diatomaceous Earth/Terre de Diatomees, Malic Acid, Lactic Acid, Zinc Sulfate, Tocopherol, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Red 6 Lake (CI 15850), Red 34 Lake (CI 15880), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140)].

description_en:
**Bourjois Fabuleux Gel Nail Polish** for fabulous nails in two steps! Intense, glossy gel-effect colors deliver salon-quality results at home, without a UV lamp.  Enjoy a deliciously scented, long-lasting formula, up to 10 days! It's gelatinous, it's wonderful, it's Fabuleux: indulgence at your fingertips!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Fabuleux Gel Nail Polish**:
â­ Apply one coat, let it dry before applying a second coat.
â­ Apply a top coat for extended wear and a high-shine finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Fabuleux Gel Nail Polish**:
â­ Ethyl Acetate, Butyl Acetate, Nitrocellulose, Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer, Acetyl Tributyl Citrate, Isopropyl Alcohol, Stearalkonium Bentonite, HEA/IPDI Isocyanurate Trimer/PG Crosspolymer, Parfum/Fragrance, n-Butyl Alcohol, Silica, Kaolin, Diacetone Alcohol, Limonene, Hexanal, Sorbic Acid, Aqua/Water/Eau, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/IPDI/PPG-15 Glyceryl Ether Copolymer, Lithothamnion Calcareum Extract, Alcohol, Phosphoric Acid, Mannitol, Glycolic Acid, Alpha- Isomethyl Ionone, Solum Diatomeae/Diatomaceous Earth/Terre de Diatomees, Malic Acid, Lactic Acid, Zinc Sulfate, Tocopherol, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Red 6 Lake (CI 15850), Red 34 Lake (CI 15880), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140)].

description_en:
**Bourjois Fabuleux Gel Nail Polish**, get fabulous nails in just two steps! Intense, glossy gel-effect colors for salon-quality results at home, without a UV lamp. Deliciously scented, long-lasting formula for up to 10 days of wear. It's gelatinous, it's wonderful, it's **Fabuleux**!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Fabuleux Gel Nail Polish**:
â­ Apply one coat, let it dry before applying a second coat.
â­ Apply one coat of top coat for extended wear and a high-shine finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Fabuleux Gel Nail Polish**:
â­ Ethyl Acetate, Butyl Acetate, Nitrocellulose, Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer, Acetyl Tributyl Citrate, Isopropyl Alcohol, Stearalkonium Bentonite, HEA/IPDI Isocyanurate Trimer/PG Crosspolymer, Parfum/Fragrance, n-Butyl Alcohol, Silica, Kaolin, Diacetone Alcohol, Limonene, Hexanal, Sorbic Acid, Aqua/Water/Eau, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/IPDI/PPG-15 Glyceryl Ether Copolymer, Lithothamnion Calcareum Extract, Alcohol, Phosphoric Acid, Mannitol, Glycolic Acid, Alpha- Isomethyl Ionone, Solum Diatomeae/Diatomaceous Earth/Terre de Diatomees, Malic Acid, Lactic Acid, Zinc Sulfate, Tocopherol, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Red 6 Lake (CI 15850), Red 34 Lake (CI 15880), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140)].

**Byphasse Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizing Serum - 50ml** is an ultra-hydrating serum that provides 24-hour hydration, restores skin elasticity, and helps reduce the signs of aging. It contains hyaluronic acid* and provitamin B5.  A smooth and moisturizing formula. *Derivative of hyaluronic acid.

â­ Apply daily morning and/or night to cleansed skin.

â­ Recommended to use before Skin Booster moisturizer.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Byphasse Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizing Serum - 50ml**:
â­ Hyaluronic Acid

**Byphasse Niacinamide Anti-Dark Spots Serum - 50ml** is a powerful serum that brightens and revitalizes your skin. â­Improves skin texture and prevents the appearance of new dark spots. â­Provides 24-hour hydration. â­Contains niacinamide and hyaluronic acid, as well as provitamin B5 and vitamin E. â­Formula with skin-toning and antioxidant properties. â­Helps restore skin elasticity and natural radiance. â­Reduces signs of aging. â­Ideal for daily use. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Byphasse Niacinamide Anti-Dark Spots Serum - 50ml**: â­Apply daily morning and/or night to cleansed skin. â­Massage gently from the center outwards, avoiding the eye contour. â­Allow to absorb completely before applying moisturizer. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Byphasse Niacinamide Anti-Dark Spots Serum - 50ml**: â­Niacinamide, â­Hyaluronic Acid, â­Provitamin B5, â­Vitamin E.

For sensitive skin, **Byphasse Sensitive Douceur Intimate Wipes 20 Units** are the ideal choice.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Byphasse Sensitive Douceur Intimate Wipes 20 Units**:

description_en:
**Cantu Argan Oil Leave-In Conditioner Cream 453 Gm** is a deep penetrating treatment infused with pure Argan Oil and other natural ingredients. It protects your hair from daily styling damage and promotes strong, healthy hair when used daily. Great for relaxed, texturized, colored & permed hair.

â­ Deeply moisturizes to protect hair from damage.
â­ Formulated for over-heated, over-styled hair.
â­ Argan Oil encourages shine, elasticity & growth.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cantu Argan Oil Leave-In Conditioner Cream 453 Gm**:
â­ Daily Styling: Apply a generous amount to the ends of damp hair and work towards the roots. Comb through for even distribution. Do not rinse. Apply more to the ends of longer hair or problem areas.
â­ Leave-In Treatment: Apply as directed above and cover with a plastic cap overnight for intense conditioning.
â­ Frizz-Free Hair: Apply daily to split ends or damaged areas. Comb through and let dry naturally.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cantu Argan Oil Leave-In Conditioner Cream 453 Gm**:
â­ Aqua (Water), Cetearyl Alcohol, Canola Oil, Glycerin, Polyquaternium-37, Parfum (Fragrance), Cetyl Alcohol, Argania Spinsosa (Argan) Oil, Propylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Dicetyldimonium Chloride, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Stearyl Alcohol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Dimethicone, Isopropyl Alcohol, PPG-1 Trideceth-6, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Polyquaterium-10, Disodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Sodium Chloride, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Trisodium HEDTA, Sodium Ferrocyanide, Benzyl Alcohol, Linalool, D-Limonene.

description_en:
**Cantu Kids Care Leave-In Conditioner 283 Ml** provides gentle care for your child's hair. This leave-in conditioner moisturizes and nourishes fragile coils, curls and waves, leaving hair soft and manageable. It's formulated with shea butter, coconut oil and honey. Free from sulfates, silicones, parabens and mineral oil.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cantu Kids Care Leave-In Conditioner 283 Ml**:
â­ Apply a generous amount of **Cantu Kids Care Leave-In Conditioner 283 Ml** to the ends of damp hair.
â­ Gently work the product from ends to roots.
â­ Comb through for even distribution.
â­ Do not rinse.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cantu Kids Care Leave-In Conditioner 283 Ml**:
â­ Water
â­ Cetyl Alcohol
â­ Glycerin
â­ Glyceryl Stearate
â­ Behentrimonium Chloride
â­ Shea Butter

â­ Coconut Oil

â­ Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium
â­ Panthenol
â­ Honey

description_en:
**Cantu Leave-In Conditioning Repair Cream 453 gm** is a shea butter infused deep penetrating conditioning treatment made with pure shea butter and other natural oils to stop and mend breakage, repair split ends, and add manageability and shine with every application. When used daily, **Cantu Leave-In Conditioning Repair Cream 453 gm** helps promote stronger, healthier hair. Great for relaxed, texturized, colored & permed hair. 2014 Hype Hair Readerâ€™s Choice Winner (Dec).

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cantu Leave-In Conditioning Repair Cream 453 gm**:
â­ Apply a generous amount to ends of damp hair and work toward roots.
â­ Comb through for even distribution.
â­ Do not rinse.
â­ Apply more to the ends of longer hair or problem areas.
â­ For leave-in treatment: Apply as directed above and cover with a plastic cap overnight.
â­ For frizz-free hair: Apply daily to split ends or damaged areas. Comb through and let dry naturally.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cantu Leave-In Conditioning Repair Cream 453 gm**:
â­ Aqua (Water), Cetearyl Alcohol, Canola Oil, Glycerin, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Dicetyldimonium Chloride, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Parfum (Fragrance), Dimethicone, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Polyquaternium-10, Sodium Chloride, Disodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cyclopentasiloxane, Cyclohexasiloxane, Dimethicone PEG-8 Meadowfoamate, Polyquaternium-37, Propylene Glycol Dicaprylate / Dicaprate, PPG-1 Trideceth-6, Panthenol, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Pentaerythrityl Tetracaprylate/Tetracaprate, Silk Amino Acids, Hydrolyzed Collagen (Peptone), Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Oil, Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Achillea Millefolium (Yarrow) Extract, Actinidia Chinensis (Kiwi) Fruit Water, Propylene Glycol, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Methyltaurate, Hydrolysed Wheat Protein PG-Propyl Silanetriol, Benzyl Salicylate, Coumarin, Limonene, Hexyl Cinnamal, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Linalool.

description_en:
**Cantu Cleansing Cream Shampoo 400 ml**, an award-winning sulfate-free shampoo that deeply cleanses and restores your hair's natural beauty. Made with 100% pure Shea Butter, it gently removes buildup from hair and scalp, moisturizes to prevent breakage, and promotes healthy hair growth. Safe for natural and color-treated hair, free from sulfates, silicones, parabens, and mineral oil.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cantu Cleansing Cream Shampoo 400 ml**:
â­ Wet hair completely.
â­ Massage shampoo into wet hair from roots to ends.
â­ Lather gently, then rinse thoroughly with cool water.
â­ A second lather and rinse is recommended for hair with heavy product buildup.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cantu Cleansing Cream Shampoo 400 ml**:
â­ Aqua (Water), Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Acrylates Copolymer, Cocamide DIPA, Glycerin, Glycol Distearate, Steareth-4, Phenoxyethanol, Parfum (Fragrance), PEG-150 Distearate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Polyquaternium-39, Polyester-11, Sodium Hydroxide, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Disodium EDTA, Panthenol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Polysorbate 20, Sodium Chloride, Citric Acid, Benzyl Benzoate

description_en:
**Cantu Avocado Styling Gel 524 gm** is a revolutionary styling gel that provides your hair with the nourishment and hydration it needs. This innovative gel comes with a unique blend of shea butter and avocado oil, making it ideal for all hair types, especially curly and wavy hair. Say goodbye to dry and brittle hair, and welcome soft, shiny hair with **Cantu Avocado Styling Gel 524 gm**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cantu Avocado Styling Gel 524 gm**:
â­ Wet your hair thoroughly.
â­ Section your hair into small parts.
â­ Apply a generous amount of **Cantu Avocado Styling Gel 524 gm** to each section.
â­ Distribute the gel evenly using a comb or your fingers.
â­ For best results, mix the gel with Cantu Coconut Curling Cream or Cantu Curl Activating Cream.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cantu Avocado Styling Gel 524 gm**:
â­ Water (Aqua, Eau)
â­ Carbomer
â­ Polysorbate-20
â­ VP/VA Copolymer
â­ Fragrance (Parfum)
â­ Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil
â­ Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter
â­ Aminomethyl Propanol
â­ Phenoxyethanol
â­ Benzoic Acid
â­ Ethylhexylglycerin
â­ Glyceteth-2 Cocoate
â­ Glycerin
â­ Disodium EDTA

**Cantu Coconut Curling Cream 340 gm** is the perfect cream to define and soften curls. Its unique formula, rich in shea butter, provides the necessary moisture without weighing down your hair.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cantu Coconut Curling Cream 340 gm**:
â­ Apply to damp hair, section by section, from roots to ends.
â­ Do not rinse after application.
â­ Use an appropriate amount depending on your hair length and thickness.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cantu Coconut Curling Cream 340 gm**:
â­ Aqua (Water)

title_en: Cantu Leave In Conditioning Cream 340 gm
title_ar: ÙƒØ§Ù†ØªÙˆ ÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ… Ù…Ø±Ø·Ø¨ Ù„Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± 340 Ø¬Ù…
description_en:
**Cantu Leave In Conditioning Cream 340 gm** is a shea butter infused deep penetrating conditioning treatment made with pure shea butter and other natural oils to stop and mend breakage, repair split ends, and add manageability and shine with every application. When used daily, **Cantu Leave-In Conditioning Cream** helps promote stronger, healthier hair. Great for relaxed, texturized, colored & permed hair. 2014 Hype Hair Readerâ€™s Choice Award Winner (Dec).

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cantu Leave In Conditioning Cream**:
â­ Daily Styling: Apply a generous amount to ends of damp hair and work toward roots. Comb through for even distribution. Do not rinse. Apply more to the ends of longer hair or problem areas.
â­ Leave-In Treatment: Apply as directed for â€œDaily Stylingâ€ and cover with a plastic cap overnight for maximum absorption and intense conditioning.
â­ Frizz Free Hair: Apply daily to split ends or damaged areas. Comb through and let dry naturally.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cantu Leave In Conditioning Cream**:
â­ Aqua (Water), Canola Oil, Cetyl Alcohol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Stearyl Alcohol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Glycerin, Ceteareth-20, Phenoxyethanol, (Parfum (Fragrance), Lactic Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Polyquaternium-4, Panthenol, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Argania Spinosa Kernel (Argan) Oil, Melia Azadirachta (Neem) Seed Oil, Mango (Magnifera Indica) Seed Oil, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Maltodextrin, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Hydrolyzed Silk, Saccharum Officinarum (Sugar Cane) Extract, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract , Laminaria Digitata Extract, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Leaf Extract, Urtica Dioica Extract, Lonicera Caprifolium Extract, Benzyl Benzoate, Coumarin, Hexyl Cinnamal.

title_en: Cantu Avocado Hydrating Curling Cream 340 gm
title_ar: ÙƒØ§Ù†ØªÙˆ ÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ… ØªØ¬Ø¹ÙŠØ¯ Ø¨Ø§Ù„Ø£ÙÙˆÙƒØ§Ø¯Ùˆ 340 Ø¬Ù…
description_en:
**Cantu Avocado Hydrating Curling Cream 340 gm** is the perfect styling cream for your curls! This amazing cream moisturizes dry, brittle hair while providing ultimate curl definition.  Enjoy its rich formula with shea butter, mango butter, coconut oil, and avocado oil to deeply nourish and hydrate your hair. Say goodbye to frizz and unmanageable hair!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cantu Avocado Hydrating Curling Cream 340 gm**:
â­ Apply to damp hair, section by section, from root to ends.
â­ Do not rinse.
â­ To refresh your curls, apply to dry hair.
â­ For best results, use with Cantuâ€™s styling gel.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cantu Avocado Hydrating Curling Cream 340 gm**:
â­WATER (AQUA, EAU)
â­GLYCERIN
â­CETEARYL ALCOHOL
â­CETEARETH-20
â­CANOLA OIL
â­PERSEA GRATISSIMA (AVOCADO) OIL
â­CETETH-20
â­BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII (SHEA) BUTTER
â­GLYCOL STEARATE
â­PETROLATUM
â­FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)
â­COCOS NUCIFERA (COCONUT) OIL
â­PRUNUS AMYGDALUS DULCIS (SWEET ALMOND) OIL
â­SIMMONDSIA CHINENSIS (JOJOBA) SEED OIL
â­OLEA EUROPAEA (OLIVE) FRUIT OIL
â­MANGIFERA INDICA (MANGO) SEED BUTTER
â­ARGANIA SPINOSA (ARGAN) KERNEL OIL
â­MELIA AZADIRACHTA (NEEM) SEED OIL
â­DAUCUS CAROTA SATIVA (CARROT) SEED OIL
â­MACADAMIA TERNIFOLIA SEED OIL
â­MANGIFERA INDICA (MANGO) SEED OIL
â­VITIS VINIFERA (GRAPE) SEED OIL
â­ALOE BARBADENSIS (ALOE VERA) LEAF JUICE (DECOLORIZED)
â­LONICERA CAPRIFOLIUM (HONEYSUCKLE) FLOWER EXTRACT
â­MACROCYSTIS PYRIFERA (KELP) EXTRACT
â­SALVIA OFFICINALIS (SAGE) LEAF EXTRACT
â­URTICA DIOICA (NETTLE) EXTRACT
â­GLYCINE SOJA (SOYBEAN) OIL
â­HYDROLYZED SILK PROTEIN
â­POLYETHYLENE GLYCOL
â­POLYQUATERNIUM-10
â­PHENOXYETHANOL
â­ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN
â­SILK AMINO ACIDS
â­SODIUM PHYTATE
â­TETRASODIUM GLUTAMATE DIACETATE.

description_en:
**Cantu Kids Care Conditioner 227 Ml** - A nourishing conditioner that provides exceptional softness and hydration.

â­ Gently moisturizes and revitalizes hair strands.
â­ Free of sulfates, silicones, parabens, and mineral oils.
â­ Gentle care for wavy hair.
â­ Enriched with shea butter, coconut oil, and honey.
â­ Makes hair easier to style.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cantu Kids Care Conditioner 227 Ml**:
â­ Apply a generous amount to clean, wet hair.
â­ Massage from roots to ends.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with cool water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cantu Kids Care Conditioner 227 Ml**:
â­ Water, cetyl alcohol, stearyl alcohol, glycerin, stearamidopropyl dimethylamine, glyceryl stearate, phenoxyethanol, butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter, cocos nucifera (coconut) oil, mel (honey) extract, fragrance, isostearyl neopentanoate, lactic acid, polyester-11, isohexadecane, ethylhexylglycerin, disodium edta, panthenol, isostearyl alcohol, benzyl benzoate, benzyl salicylate, hexyl cinnamal, linalool.

title_ar: **ÙƒØ§Ù†ØªÙˆ ÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ… Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø¨Ø§Ù„Ø£ÙÙˆÙƒØ§Ø¯Ùˆ 340 Ø¬Ù…**
description_en:
**Cantu Avocado Leave In Conditioning Cream 340 gm**, fortify your way to healthy-looking hair. â­ Nourishes all curl types, including curly, coily, and wavy hair. â­ Deeply moisturizes without weighing hair down. â­ Adds shine and softness. â­ Protects against breakage and damage. â­ Detangles and smooths hair. â­ Enriched with avocado oil and shea butter. â­ Natural formula free of harsh chemicals. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cantu Avocado Leave In Conditioning Cream**
â­ Apply a generous amount to damp hair, working from ends to roots. 
â­ Comb through for even distribution. 
â­ Do not rinse. 
â­ Apply more to longer hair or problem areas.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cantu Avocado Leave In Conditioning Cream**
â­ Aqua (Water), Cetearyl Alcohol, Canola Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Parfum (Fragrance), Dicetyldimonium Chloride, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Dimethicone, Phenoxyethanol, Isopropyl Alcohol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Polyquaternium-10, Sodium Ferrocyanide, Trisodium HEDTA, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Chloride, Citric Acid, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cyclopentasiloxane, Cyclohexasiloxane, Sodium Methyltaurate, Dimethicone PEG-8 Meadowfoamate, Polyquaternium-37, Propylene Glycol Dicaprylate / Dicaprate, PPG-1 Trideceth-6, Panthenol, Hydrolysed Wheat Protein PG Propyl Silanetriol, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Pentaerythrityl Tetracaprylate/Tetracaprate, Silk Amino Acids, Hydrolyzed Collagen (Peptone), Citrus Sinensis (Orange) Peel Oil, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Leaf Extract, Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Achillea Millefolium (Yarrow) Extract, Actinidia Chinensis (Kiwi) Fruit Extract, Propylene Glycol, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Sodium Hyaluronate, Benzyl salicylate, Geraniol, Hexyl cinnamal, Linalool.

#Cantu #HairCream #Avocado #HealthyHair #Moisturizing #HairCare #LeaveInConditioner #SoftHair #NaturalIngredients #Beauty

description_en:
**Cantu Moisturizing Curl Activator Cream 355 ml** is the perfect solution for healthy, shiny, curly hair. This cream provides deep moisture to tame frizz and achieve soft, silky hair. â­Strengthens hair from within and adds shine from the outside. â­Helps volumize even the finest strands. â­Nourishes hair and reduces breakage. â­Free of mineral oil, sulfates, parabens, silicones, phthalates, and gluten.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cantu Moisturizing Curl Activator Cream 355 ml**: â­Apply to damp, towel-dried hair, section by section. â­Reapply to dry hair as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cantu Moisturizing Curl Activator Cream 355 ml**: â­Water (Aqua, Eau), Glycerin, Propanediol, Fragrance (Parfum), Polyquaternium-10, Stearalkonium Chloride, Stearyl Alcohol, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil, Melia Azadirachta (Neem) Seed Oil, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Seed Oil, Lonicera Japonica (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Laminaria Cloustoni (Sea Kelp) Extract, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Leaf Extract, Macadamia Ternifolia (Macadamia) Seed Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Extract, Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Extract, Silk Amino Acids, Cetyl Alcohol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Polysorbate-60, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin.

description_en:
**Cantu Wave Whip Curling Mousse 248 gm** creates soft, touchable waves and curls, leaving your hair frizz-free and full of volume. Made with pure shea butter and formulated without harsh ingredients, **Cantu Wave Whip Curling Mousse 248 gm** is the perfect solution for naturally beautiful waves. It's free of mineral oil, sulfates, parabens, silicones, phthalates, gluten, paraffin, and propylene.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cantu Wave Whip Curling Mousse 248 gm**:
â­ Apply to wet hair.
â­ Scrunch hair upward toward the scalp.
â­ Hold and release.
â­ Allow hair to air dry or diffuse.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cantu Wave Whip Curling Mousse 248 gm**:
â­ Aqua (Water)
â­ PEG-25 Hydrogenated Castor Oil
â­ PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate
â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine
â­ Phenoxyethanol
â­ Benzyl Alcohol

description_en:
**Cantu Maximum Hold Styling Gel 524g** is a styling gel infused with Jamaican Black Castor Oil and Shea Butter, perfect for maximum hold and strengthening strands while adding definition.  **Cantu Maximum Hold Styling Gel 524g** gives you strong hold without alcohol, crunch, flakes, or itch.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cantu Maximum Hold Styling Gel 524g**:
â­ Before application: Use Cantu Leave-In Cream.
â­ Follow with your favorite Cantu Curling Cream.
â­ Then, apply **Cantu Maximum Hold Styling Gel 524g** to your hair for long-lasting definition.
â­ Distribute the product evenly through the hair and define your natural curls.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cantu Maximum Hold Styling Gel 524g**:
â­ Aqua (Water)
â­ Carbomer
â­ Polysorbate 20
â­ Vp / Va Copolymer
â­ Perfume (Fragrance)
â­ Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil
â­ Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter
â­ Aminomethyl Propanol
â­ Phenoxyethanol
â­ Benzoic Acid
â­ Ethylhexylglycerin
â­ Glycereth-2 C Glycerin
â­ Disodium Edta
â­ Hydrolyzed Soy Protein
â­ Benzyl Alcohol
â­ Potassium Sorbate
â­ Sodium Benzoate
â­ Limonene.

description_en:
**Cantu Deep Treatment Masque 340 gm** is an award-winning formula that penetrates deep into the hair shaft to repair and replenish over-processed, damaged hair. Made with pure shea butter and formulated without harsh ingredients like mineral oil, sulfates, parabens, silicones, phthalates, gluten, paraffin, or propylene. Winner of the 2014 Jones Best in Beauty Award.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cantu Deep Treatment Masque 340 gm**:
â­ Thoroughly coat damp hair section by section.
â­ Let it set for 30 minutes.
â­ Rinse with cool water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cantu Deep Treatment Masque 340 gm**:
â­Aqua (Water), Canola Oil, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Beeswax, Pafrum (Fragrance), Cetyl Alcohol, Butyrospermum Parkii Shea Butter, Ceteareth -20, Glycol Stearate, Polyquaterium-10, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Extract, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil, Melia Azadirachta (Neem) Seed Oil, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Seed Oil, Macadamia Ternifolia (Macadamia) Seed Oil, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Oil, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Hydrolyzed Silk, Lonicera Caprifolium (Honeysuckle) Extract, Macrocystis Pyrifera (Kelp) Extract, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Leaf Extract, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Extract, Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Extract, Silk Amino Acids, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe) Leaf Juice, Coumarin, Benzyl Benzoate, Hexyl Cinnamal.

description_en:
**Cantu Hydrating Leave-In Conditioning Mist** instantly shines, hydrates, and conditions hair. Made with pure shea butter to replace vital moisture, revealing stronger, healthier hair with a natural shine.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cantu Hydrating Leave-In Conditioning Mist**:
â­ Spray on damp hair.
â­ Do not rinse.
â­ Style as usual.

Styling Tips:
â­ Use Cantu Thermal Shield Heat Protectant before heat styling.
â­ Use Cantu Oil Sheen Deep Conditioning Spray after heat styling for extra protection from split ends and breakage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cantu Hydrating Leave-In Conditioning Mist**:
â­ Aqua (Water), Glycerin, PEG-75 Lanolin, Oleth-10, Dicetyldimonium Chloride, Polysorbate 60, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii Shae Butter, Phenoxythanol, Parfum (Fragrance), Panthenol, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hydrolyzed Silk, Lonicera Caprifolium (Honeysuckle) Extract, Macrocystis Pyrifera (Kelp) Extract, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Leaf Extract, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Extract, Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Extract, Silk Amino Acids, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe) Leaf Juice, Benzyl Salicylate, Coumarin, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Hexyl Cinnamal, D-Limonene, Linalool.

description_en:
**Cantu Avocado Hydrating Conditioner 400ml** is a rich formula made with Shea Butter and Avocado Oil to nourish and smooth hair. **Cantu Avocado Hydrating Conditioner 400ml** restores your authentic beauty with formulas designed for curly, coily, or wavy hair.

â­ Moisturizes and softens hair
â­ Ideal for dry, brittle hair
â­ Enriched with Avocado Oil and Shea Butter
â­ Gentle hydrating formula moisturizes hair and scalp
â­ Helps reduce breakage and frizz
â­ Leaves hair soft and shiny
â­ Silicone-free

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cantu Avocado Hydrating Conditioner 400ml**:
â­ Apply to wet hair and massage from root to ends.
â­ Focus on the scalp and roots; use regularly for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cantu Avocado Hydrating Conditioner 400ml**:
â­ Aqua (Water), Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Cocamide DIPA, Glycerin, Parfum (Fragrance), Phenoxyethanol, Acrylates Copolymer, Sodium Chloride, Glycol Distearate, PEG-150 Distearate, Steareth-4, Polyester-37, Sodium Benzoate, Polyquaternium-39, Ethylhexylglycerin, Disodium EDTA, Panthenol, Sodium Glycolate, Sodium Hydroxide, Cocamidopropyl Dimethylamine, C12-18 Fatty Acids, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Polysorbate 20, Citric Acid, Benzyl salicylate, Geraniol, Hexyl cinnamal, Linalool.

#Cantu #HairConditioner #HydratingConditioner #HairCare #HealthyHair #HairBeauty #AvocadoOil #SheaButter #SoftHair #HairProducts

description_en:
**Cantu Define & Shine Custard 340 gm** provides ultra-moisturizing definition for healthy, shiny curls. â­Defines and hydrates dry curls. â­Reduces bulk and elongates curls. â­Provides long-lasting hold. â­Rich in shea butter and natural ingredients. â­Free of harsh chemicals like mineral oil, sulfates, parabens, silicones, phthalates, gluten, paraffin, and propylene.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cantu Define & Shine Custard 340 gm**: 
â­Apply to soaking wet hair in small sections. â­Smooth each section with fingers, beginning at the root and working toward the ends.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cantu Define & Shine Custard 340 gm**:
â­Aqua (Water), Glycerin, Cellulose Gum, Parfum (Fragrance), Pectin, Citric Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Extract, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Equisetum Arvense (Horsetail) Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Althaea Officinalis Leaf Extract, Agave Americana Leaf Extract, Canola Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract, Persea Gratisima (Avocado) Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Melia Azadirachta (Neem) Seed Oil, Daucus Carota Sativa Seed Oil, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Oil, Glycine Soja (Soyabean) Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Hydrolyzed Silk, Lonicera Caprifolium Flower Extract, Macrocystis Pyrifera Extract, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Leaf Extract, Vitis Vinifera (Red Grape) Seed Extract, Silk Amino Acid, Benzyl Benzoate, Coumarin, Hexyl Cinnamal.

#Cantu #HairCustard #CurlDefinition #CurlyHair #MoisturizingHair #HairBeauty #HairCare #HairCareProducts #SaudiArabia #Beauty

description_en:
**Cantu Comeback Curl Next Day Curl Revitalizer 355ml** redefines, moisturizes, and restores curls back to a frizz-free and vibrant state. Made with pure shea butter and formulated without harsh ingredients. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cantu Comeback Curl Next Day Curl Revitalizer 355ml**: 
â­ Spray on dry or damp hair, section by section, to restore, refresh, and revive curls, coils, and waves. 
â­ Reapply to dry hair as needed for additional moisture. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cantu Comeback Curl Next Day Curl Revitalizer 355ml**: 
â­ Aqua (Water), Glycerin, Polysorbate 20, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Phenoxyethyl Alcohol, Parfum (Fragrance), Magnesium Sulfate, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Citric Acid, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Coumarin, Hexyl Cinnamal. 

NO MINERAL OIL, SULFATES, PARABENS, SILICONES, PHTHALATES, GLUTEN, PARAFFIN, or PROPYLENE. Winner of the 2015 Ebony Beauty Awards. 

#Cantu #CurlRevitalizer #HairCare #Beauty #NaturalHair #Curls #HairProducts #SaudiArabia #KSA #HairGoals

description_en:
**Cantu Avocado Hydrating Curl Activator 355ml** is the perfect cream to smooth and define your natural curls, giving you amazing frizz-free volume. Designed for curly, coily, or wavy hair, it's made with a luxurious blend of pure Shea Butter, Avocado Oil, Aloe, Mango Seed Butter, and Olive Oil for deep hydration and ultimate definition. Restore your authentic beauty with **Cantu**!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cantu Avocado Hydrating Curl Activator 355ml**:
â­ Apply to damp hair, section by section.
â­ Reapply to dry hair as needed for additional moisture.
â­ Cocktail with Cantu Define & Shine Custard for extra shine and long-lasting hold.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cantu Avocado Hydrating Curl Activator 355ml**:
â­ Aqua (Water), Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Propanediol, Cetyl Alcohol, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Stearyl Alcohol, Arachidyl Alcohol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Polyquaternium-11, Polyquaternium-10, Parfum (Fragrance), Phenoxyethanol, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Polysorbate 60, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Ethylhexylglycerin, Silk Amino Acids, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Canola Oil, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Hydrolyzed Silk, Lonicera Caprifolium (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Macrocystis Pyrifera (Kelp) Extract, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Leaf Extract, Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Extract, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil, Melia Azadirachta (Neem) Seed Oil, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Seed Oil, Macadamia Ternifolia (Macadamia) Seed Oil, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Benzyl salicylate, Geraniol, Hexyl cinnamal, Linalool.

#Cantu #CurlCream #CurlyHair #HairCare #NaturalHair #HairProducts #HydratingCurlCream #AvocadoOil #FrizzFree #SaudiArabia

description_en:
**Cantu Guava & Ginger Scalp Exfoliating Pre-Poo Treatment - 180ml** - Treat your scalp to a fully exfoliating treatment with this powerful guava and ginger pre-poo treatment, infused with turmeric.  This unique formula relieves irritated scalps and exfoliates to stimulate healthy hair growth. It lifts oil, dirt, and impurities from hair follicles and removes dead skin. Use before shampooing. Made without harsh ingredients.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cantu Guava & Ginger Scalp Exfoliating Pre-Poo Treatment - 180ml**: 
â­ Apply a generous amount directly to the scalp before shampooing.
â­ Gently massage with your fingers or a fine-tooth comb.
â­ Repeat as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cantu Guava & Ginger Scalp Exfoliating Pre-Poo Treatment - 180ml**: 
â­ Water, glycerin, cocamidopropyl betaine, xanthan gum, hydrated silica, psidium guajava fruit extract (guava), zingiber officinale (ginger) root extract, acetic acid (apple cider vinegar), curcuma longa (turmeric) root oil, melaleuca alternifolia (tea tree) leaf oil, parfum (fragrance), menthol, menthone, mentha arvensis leaf oil, mentha piperita oil, salicylic acid, dehydroacetic acid, peg-7 glyceryl cocoate, propylene glycol, polysorbate 20, cocamidopropyl dimethylamine, benzyl alcohol, citronellol, linalool.

#Cantu #ScalpExfoliator #HairCare #HealthyHair #Guava #Ginger #Turmeric #AppleCiderVinegar #Beauty #Skincare

description_en:
**Cantu Shea Butter Tea Tree & Jojoba Hair & Scalp Oil** -  A rich oil that nourishes your hair and scalp, leaving it healthy, shiny and deeply moisturized. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cantu Shea Butter Tea Tree & Jojoba Hair & Scalp Oil**:
â­ Remove cap from nozzle to dispense product.
â­ For daily styling: Dispense a small amount into hair beginning at the root. Comb through for even distribution. Do not rinse.
â­ For scalp conditioning: Part hair into sections revealing the scalp. Massage into scalp. Do not rinse. Style as usual.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cantu Shea Butter Tea Tree & Jojoba Hair & Scalp Oil**:
â­ Petrolatum
â­ Canola Oil
â­ Shea Butter
â­ Isopropyl Palmitate
â­ Phenoxyethanol
â­ Fragrance
â­ Ethylhexylglycerin
â­ Jojoba Seed Oil
â­ Tea Tree Leaf Oil
â­ Benzyl Salicylate
â­ Coumarin
â­ Butylphenyl Methylpropional
â­ Linalool
â­ Hexyl Cinnamal
â­ Limonene.

#Cantu #HairOil #SheaButter #TeaTreeOil #JojobaOil #HairCare #HealthyHair #Beauty #Moisturizer #KSA
