description_en:
**Cantu Conditioning Creamy Hair Lotion** is perfect for managing wavy and curly hair. This creamy lotion gives you amazing volume and definition, leaving your hair soft and shiny.  **Cantu Conditioning Creamy Hair Lotion** makes combing and detangling easier than ever, making styling a breeze.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cantu Conditioning Creamy Hair Lotion**:
â­ Apply to damp hair section by section.
â­ Reapply to dry hair as needed for additional moisture.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cantu Conditioning Creamy Hair Lotion**:
â­ Aqua (Water), Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Canola Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Parfum (Fragrance), Glycol Stearate, Polyquaternium-11, Cetyl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol, Distearoylethyl Dimonium Chloride, Glyceryl Stearate, Peg-100 Stearate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil, Olea Europaea Fruit Oil, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Melia Azadirachta (Neem) Seed Oil, Daucus Carota Sativa Seed Oil, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Oil, Glycine Soja (Soya Bean) Oil, Hydrolyzed Silk, Lonicera Capri Folium Flower Extract, Macrocystis Pyrifera (Kelp) Extract, Salvia Officinalis Leaf Extract, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Extract, Urtica Dioica Leaf (Nettle) Extract, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Silk Amino Acids, Citric Acid, Benzyl Benzoate, Coumarin, Hexyl Cinnamal.

description_en:
**Cantu Moisturizing Twist & Lock Gel 370 gm** is a luxurious cream gel for hair care made with pure shea butter. â­ Deeply moisturizes hair. â­ Tames frizz. â­ Makes hair easy to style. â­ Ideal for braids and twists. â­ Rich in vitamins and minerals. â­ Free from sulfates, parabens, silicones, and mineral oil.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cantu Moisturizing Twist & Lock Gel 370 gm**: 
â­ Section your hair before use. 
â­ Apply an appropriate amount of **Cantu Moisturizing Twist & Lock Gel 370 gm** to each section. 
â­ Twist your hair or let it air dry. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cantu Moisturizing Twist & Lock Gel 370 gm**: 
â­ Aqua (Water), Polyvinylpyrrolidone, PVP, Parfum (Fragrance), Polyquaternium-37, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Canola Oil, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Oil, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Melia Azadirachta Seed Oil, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Seed Oil, Macadamia Ternifolia (Macadamia Nut) Seed Oil, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Hydrolyzed Silk, Lonicera Japonica (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Macrocystis Pyrifera (Kelp) Extract, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Leaf Extract, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Extract, Silk Amino Acids, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera Leaf Juice), Coumarin, Benzyl Benzoate, Hexyl Cinnamal.

#Cantu #HairGel #MoisturizingHair #HairStyling #SheaButter #NaturalHair #Beauty #HairCare #HairProducts #KSA

description_en:
**Cantu Kids Care Shampoo 227 Ml** is the perfect shampoo for your children's hair!  A gentle, tear-free, and sulfate-free formula that gently cleanses and promotes healthy hair growth. Rich in shea butter, coconut oil, and honey. Free from harsh ingredients like mineral oil, sulfates, parabens, silicones, phthalates, gluten, paraffin, and propylene.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cantu Kids Care Shampoo 227 Ml**:
â­ Wet hair completely.
â­ Massage into wet hair from root to tip.
â­ Work into a lather.
â­ Rinse thoroughly. A second lather and rinse are recommended for hair with heavy product build-up.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cantu Kids Care Shampoo 227 Ml**:
â­ Water, cocamidopropyl betaine, sodium lauroyl methyl isethionate, sodium methyl oleoyl taurate, sodium chloride, lauryl glucoside, coco-glucoside, glycerin, fragrance, sodium benzoate, polyquaternium-7, citric acid, magnesium nitrate, methylchloroisothiazolinone, methylisothiazolinone, magnesium chloride, honey extract, cocos nucifera (coconut) oil, butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter, phenoxyethanol, benzyl benzoate, benzyl salicylate.

#Cantu #KidsShampoo #HairCare #KidsProducts #KidsBeauty #HealthyHair #SheaButter #CoconutOil #NaturalIngredients #SaudiArabia

description_en:
**Cantu Avocado Hydrating Refresher Spray 355ml** gives a quick boost of moisture, shine, and hydration to second-day curls and older twist-outs. This refreshing spray, formulated with a unique blend of marshmallow root, pure honey, and avocado oil, nourishes curls with the essential nutrients to revitalize dry, dull hair.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cantu Avocado Hydrating Refresher Spray 355ml**:
â­ Spray generously on wet or dry hair to refresh curls.
â­ In case of eye contact, rinse well with plenty of clean water. If eye irritation persists, contact a doctor. 
â­ For external use only. If swallowed, contact a physician or poison control center immediately.
â­ Keep out of reach of children.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cantu Avocado Hydrating Refresher Spray 355ml**:
â­ Water (Aqua, Eau), Glycerin, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Polysorbate 20, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Linum Usitatissimum (Linseed) Seed Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Honey (Mel, Miel), Fragrance (Parfum), Ethylhexylglycerin, Benzyl Alcohol, Magnesium Sulfate, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Citric Acid, Silk Amino Acids, Althea Officinalis Root Extract.

#Cantu #HairSpray #HairCare #HydratedHair #AvocadoOil #HealthyHair #HairBeauty #HairCareProducts #HydratingSpray #SaudiArabia

description_en:
**Cantu Protective Styles Braiding & Twisting Gel 227g** is your perfect solution for perfectly slicked and moisturized braids. This firm, long-lasting, non-greasy gel provides a strong hold with deep hydration for your hair. Ideal for natural hair and extensions, it works to set the foundation of braids under weaves & wigs, cornrows and box braids, or to retwist locs. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cantu Protective Styles Braiding & Twisting Gel 227g**:
â­ Part clean hair into sections.
â­ Apply with fingertips through the roots of each section.
â­ Reapply with a comb to achieve cleaner parts.
â­ Reapply on the ends of the hair to hydrate and seal.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cantu Protective Styles Braiding & Twisting Gel 227g**:
â­ Aqua/water
â­ Ceteareth-25
â­ Glycerin
â­ Oleth-5
â­ Peg-25 hydrogenated castor oil
â­ Sclerocarya birrea (marula) seed oil
â­ Aloe barbadensis (aloe vera) leaf juice (decolorized)
â­ Tocopheryl acetate (vitamin e)
â­ Althaea officinalis (marshmallow) root extract
â­ Ricinus communis (castor) seed oil
â­ Hydrolyzed quinoa
â­ Ethylhexylglycerin
â­ Citric acid
â­ Potassium sorbate
â­ Sodium benzoate
â­ Phenoxyethanol
â­ Parfum (fragrance)
â­ Citronellol
â­ Coumarin
â­ Hexylcinnamal
â­ Limonene
â­ Linalool.

description_en:
**Cantu Protective Styles Conditioning Detangler 237ml** is a 2-in-1 conditioner providing superior slip to remove tangles in extensions while adding moisture and shine to your natural hair. It helps work away knots accumulated from wearing protective styles for long periods. Infused with aloe vera and marula oil to soften, smooth & moisturize. Great for wigs and extension hair, in addition to natural hair. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cantu Protective Styles Conditioning Detangler 237ml**:
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ After cleansing, spray on hair generously to detangle and soften strands, then rinse.
â­ When taking down protective styles, spray on the ends of braids to assist with gently detangling.
â­ For curly extensions and wigs, spray 1-2 pumps and use as a leave-in detangler.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cantu Protective Styles Conditioning Detangler 237ml**:
â­ Aqua/water, glycerin, glyceryl stearate, sclerocarya birrea (marula) seed oil, aloe barbadensis (aloe vera) leaf juice (decolorized), cocos nucifera (coconut) oil, rosmarinus officinalis (rosemary) leaf oil, tocopheryl acetate (vitamin e), hydrolyzed quinoa, lavandula angustifolia (lavender) flower oil, parfum/fragrance, cetearyl alcohol, cetyl alcohol, panthenol (vitamin b), phenoxyethanol, stearalkonium chloride, guar hydroxypropyltrimonium chloride, ethylhexylglycerin, stearyl alcohol, citric acid, potassium sorbate, sodium benzoate, citronellol, coumarin, hexyl cinnamal, limonene, linalool.

description_en:
**Cantu Hair & Scalp Oil Strengthening Biotin-Infused 59ml** is a lightweight, non-greasy oil that soothes dry scalp and helps seal in moisture, adding shine to strands with a fresh, invigorating scent. It's made with 99% naturally derived ingredients, and is a vegan product suitable for daily use.  It nourishes the scalp and helps strengthen hair follicles. It's rich in biotin, rosemary, tea tree, peppermint, avocado and other essential oils and nutrients to promote healthy hair growth. Free of parabens, silicones, petrolatum, mineral oil, paraffin, phthalates, color additives, or propylene glycol.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cantu Hair & Scalp Oil Strengthening Biotin-Infused 59ml**:
â­ Apply to scalp, then gently massage and comb through strands.
â­ Leave on and style.
â­ Use daily for best results.
â­ For scalp treatment, cover with a processing cap and let sit for 10 minutes, then rinse.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cantu Hair & Scalp Oil Strengthening Biotin-Infused 59ml**:
â­ Glycine soja (soybean) oil
â­ Ricinus communis (castor) seed oil
â­ Rosmarinus officinalis (rosemary) leaf oil
â­ Mentha piperita (peppermint) flower/leaf/stem oil
â­ Eucalyptus globulus leaf oil
â­ Melaleuca alternifolia (tea tree) leaf oil
â­ Biotin (vitamin b7)
â­ Oryza sativa (rice) bran oil
â­ Persea gratissima (avocado) oil
â­ Tocopheryl acetate (vitamin e)
â­ Linum usitatissimum (linseed) seed oil (flaxseed)
â­ Butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter
â­ Helianthus annuus (sunflower) seed oil
â­ Equisetum arvense (horsetail) leaf extract
â­ Urtica dioica (nettle) leaf extract
â­ Arctium lappa (burdock) root extract
â­ Tocopherol (vitamin e)
â­ Ascorbic acid (vitamin c)
â­ Benzyl nicotinate
â­ Menthol
â­ Retinyl palmitate
â­ Limonene
â­ Linalool

#Cantu #HairOil #HairCare #Biotin #HealthyHair #Beauty #HairProducts #SaudiArabia #ShinyHair #HairGrowth

description_en:
**Cantu Protective Styles Setting Foam 237ml** is the perfect foam to set braided styles & wigs, refresh braids & curly hair extensions, and lay down edges - without crunch or residue. It provides a medium hold and includes apple cider vinegar to help refresh the scalp and reduce flaking & dryness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cantu Protective Styles Setting Foam 237ml**:
â­ Braided Styles: Apply 2-3 pumps, wrap, and allow to fully dry.
â­ Smoothing Edges & Setting Wigs: Apply liberally and comb or brush in the desired position. Wrap and dry fully before styling.
â­ Curly/Wavy Extensions: Apply to damp or frizzy hair as needed and comb, brush, or shingle the curls to the desired effect. Air dry, diffuse, or set under a hooded dryer for final result.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cantu Protective Styles Setting Foam 237ml**:
â­ Aqua/water, decyl glucoside, hydrolyzed corn starch, cocamidopropyl betaine, peg-7 glyceryl cocoate, pvp, aloe barbadensis (aloe vera leaf juice (decolorized), sclerocarya birrea (marula) seed oil, panthenol (vitamin B5), tocopheryl acetate (vitamin E), acetic acid (apple cider vinegar, althaea officinalis (marshmallow) root extract, hydrolyzed quinoa, phenoxyethanol, parfum/fragrance, cetrimonium chloride, ethylhexylglycerin, citric acid, glycerin, hexyl cinnamal, linalool, coumarin, limonene, citronellol.

#Cantu #SettingFoam #HairProtection #BraidedHair #WigStyling #HairCare #HairBeauty #HairProducts #AppleCiderVinegar #KSA

description_en:
**Cantu Protective Styles Daily Oil Drops 59ml** provides daily nourishment and protection for your hair, especially during protective styling. This lightweight oil blend, enriched with avocado oil, tea tree oil, and vitamin E, helps to soothe the scalp, reduce dryness, and promote healthy hair growth. Perfect for braids, twists, locs, and weaves, this oil adds shine and a smooth finish to your hair without weighing it down.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cantu Protective Styles Daily Oil Drops 59ml**:
â­ Use daily before and during protective styling.
â­ Gently massage into the scalp and ends of hair.
â­ Suitable for natural hair and extensions.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cantu Protective Styles Daily Oil Drops 59ml**:
â­ Avocado Oil
â­ Tea Tree Oil
â­ Peppermint Oil
â­ Vitamin E
â­ Rice Bran
â­ Nettle Extracts

description_en:
**Cantu Protective Styles Deodorizing Mist 118ml** is a refreshing spray designed to eliminate odors from hair, especially in protective styles like braids and wigs. Its unique formula combines deodorizers, apple cider vinegar, and tea tree & lavender oils to ensure your hair stays fresh and clean for longer. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cantu Protective Styles Deodorizing Mist 118ml**: 
â­ Spray as needed on your hair daily or as needed. 
â­ Avoid contact with eyes. 
â­ For external use only. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cantu Protective Styles Deodorizing Mist 118ml**: 
â­ Aqua/water, glycerin, peg-7 glyceryl cocoate, polysorbate 20, parfum (fragrance), dipropylene glycol, zinc ricinoleate, trisodium dicarboxymethyl alaninate, sclerocarya birrea (marula) seed oil, aloe barbadensis (aloe vera) leaf juice (decolorized), acetic acid (apple cider vinegar), melaleuca alternifolia (tea tree) oil, panthenol (vitamin b5), lavandula angustifolia + (lavender) flower oil, tocopheryl acetate (vitamin e) phenoxyethanol, hydrolyzed corn starch, cocamidopropyl betaine, ethylhexylglycerin, citric acid, citronellol, coumarin, hexyl cinnamal, limonene, linalool.

description_en:
**Cantu Intensive Repair Deep Treatment Masque 50 gm** is a rich hair masque formulated to restore and strengthen dry, damaged hair. This deeply moisturizing hair treatment works on all natural hair types, leaving your hair revitalized and shiny.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cantu Intensive Repair Deep Treatment Masque 50 gm**:
â­ Apply generously to clean, damp hair.
â­ Cover hair with a plastic cap and leave for 15 minutes.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with cool water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cantu Intensive Repair Deep Treatment Masque 50 gm**:
â­ Aqua (Water), Canola Oil, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Beeswax, Parfum (Fragrance), Cetyl Alcohol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Ceteareth-20, Glycol Stearate, Polyquaternium-10, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut Fruit Extract, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Melia Azadirachta Seed Oil(Neem), Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Seed Oil, Macadamia Ternifolia (Macadamia) Seed Oil, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Oil, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Hydrolyzed Silk, Lonicera Caprifolium (Honeysuckle) Extract, Macrocystis Pyrifera (Kelp) Extract, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Leaf Extract, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Extract, Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Extract, Silk Amino Acids, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice (Aloe Vera Decolorized), Coumarin, Benzyl Benzoate, Hexyl Cinnamal.

**Cantu Shea Butter Super Shine Hair Silk 180 Ml** is a pre-treatment for all hairstyles. It protects against damage from hot styling tools, adding moisture for smooth, frizz-free results. Made with pure shea butter to replace vital moisture, revealing stronger, healthier hair with a natural shine. Ideal for relaxed, texturized, colored, and permed hair.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cantu Shea Butter Super Shine Hair Silk 180 Ml**:
â­ Spray on damp hair before blow drying or air drying.
â­ Dry hair completely.
â­ Lightly mist hair evenly in targeted area, section by section, before using a flat iron or curling iron.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cantu Shea Butter Super Shine Hair Silk 180 Ml**:
â­ Cyclopentasiloxane
â­ Dimethiconol
â­ SD-Alcohol 40-B
â­ Butyrospermum Parkii Butter (Shea)
â­ Hydrolyzed Silk
â­ Fragrance

title_ar: **ÙƒØ§Ù†ØªÙˆ Ù…Ø§Ø³Ùƒ Ù…Ù†Ù‚ÙŠ ÙˆÙ…Ø¬Ø¯Ø¯ Ù„Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± ÙˆÙØ±ÙˆØ© Ø§Ù„Ø±Ø£Ø³ 42 Ø¬Ù…**
description_en:
**Cantu Clarify & Renew Hair & Scalp Masque 42 gm** is the detox your scalp has always needed! Made with Bentonite Clay, shea butter, and essential oils, this classic hair masque is gentle on your hair and scalp while working thoroughly to improve hair's elasticity and add shine. This sulfate-free hair masque contains no silicones, parabens, or mineral oil, and instead is infused with vitamins that promote optimal hair health. Enjoy frizz-free curls and increased curl definition for all hair types and curl patterns. The result will be soft, nourished strands and a revitalized scalp.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cantu Clarify & Renew Hair & Scalp Masque 42 gm**:
â­ Apply generously to clean, damp hair beginning at ends and work toward the scalp.
â­ Massage into the scalp for added scalp benefits.
â­ Leave in for 10-15 minutes then rinse with cool water revealing soft, nourished strands and a revitalized scalp.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cantu Clarify & Renew Hair & Scalp Masque 42 gm**:
â­Water, Canola Oil, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Beeswax (Cera Alba), Fragrance, Bentonite, Kaolin, Cetyl Alcohol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Glycol Stearate, Polyquaternium-10, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice (Decolorized), Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil (Argan), Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Seed Oil, Acetic Acid (Apple Cider Vinegar), Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil (Macadamia), Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Oil, Melia Azadirachta Seed Oil (Neem), Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil.

For external use only

shortdescription_en: Revitalize your hair with **Cantu Clarify & Renew Hair & Scalp Masque**, enriched with Shea Butter! Soft, shiny, and healthy hair.

title_en: **Cantu Deep Nourishing & Scalp Masque With Rhassoul Clay 42gm**
title_ar: **ÙƒØ§Ù†ØªÙˆ Ù…Ø§Ø³Ùƒ Ù„Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± ÙˆÙØ±ÙˆØ© Ø§Ù„Ø±Ø£Ø³ 42 Ø¬Ù…**
description_en:
**Cantu Deep Nourishing & Scalp Masque With Rhassoul Clay 42gm** is a deeply moisturizing hair mask for curly, coily, or wavy hair types. Perfect when your hair needs a moisture boost, it provides deep, intense moisturization to hair and scalp. Made with pure shea butter to nourish and rhassoul clay to cleanse impurities and excess oils from the scalp, it tackles frizz while intensely moisturizing to combat dryness and scalp flakiness.

â­ Sulfate free
â­ Silicone free
â­ Paraben free
â­ Mineral oil free

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cantu Deep Nourishing & Scalp Masque With Rhassoul Clay 42gm**:
â­ Apply generously to clean, damp hair, beginning at the ends and working towards the scalp.
â­ Massage into the scalp for added scalp benefits.
â­ Leave in for 10-15 minutes, then rinse with cool water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cantu Deep Nourishing & Scalp Masque With Rhassoul Clay 42gm**:
â­ Aqua (Water), Canola Oil, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cera Alba (Beeswax), Parfum (Fragrance), Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Moroccan Lava Clay (Rhassoul), Polyquaternium-10, Glycol Stearate, Cetyl Alcohol, Kaolin, Bentonite, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Acetic Acid, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis Seed (Jojoba) Oil, Olea Europaea Fruit (Olive) Oil, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Argania Spinosa Kernel (Argan) Oil, Melia Azadirachta (Neem) Seed Oil, Daucus Carota Sativa Seed (Carrot) Oil, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed (Macadamia) Oil, Glycine Soja (Soyabean) Oil, Vitis Vinifera Seed (Grape) Oil, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Oil, Benzyl Benzoate, Coumarin, Hexyl Cinnamal.

#Cantu #HairMask #HairCare #Beauty #Hair #Moisturizing #RhassoulClay #SheaButter #NaturalIngredients #HairRoutine

description_en:
**Cantu Protective Styles Hair Bath And Cleanser 296ml** is a moisturizing cleanser designed specifically for protective styles. It gently cleanses hair and removes dirt and debris, while nourishing the scalp and maintaining healthy hair. 

â­ Gently cleanses hair and removes dirt and debris.
â­ Nourishes the scalp and maintains healthy hair.
â­ Suitable for all hair types worn in protective styles.
â­ Moisturizing formula to prevent hair dryness.
â­ Leaves hair soft and shiny.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cantu Protective Styles Hair Bath And Cleanser 296ml**:
â­ Apply an adequate amount to wet hair.
â­ Gently massage the scalp and rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ Repeat as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cantu Protective Styles Hair Bath And Cleanser 296ml**:
â­ Aqua/Water, Decyl Glucoside, Sorbitol, Aloe Barbadensis Aloe Vera Leaf Juice Decolorized, Sclerocarya Birrea Marula Seed Oil, Acetic Acidapple Cider Vinegar, Melaleuca Alternifolia Tea Tree Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis Rosemary Leaf Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia Lavender Flower Oil, Glycerin, Tocopheryl Acetate Vitamin E, Panthenol Vitamin B5, Hydrolyzed Quinoa, Propanediol, Phenoxyethanol, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Cetrimonium Chloride, Parfum/Fragrance, Ethylhexylglycerin, Disodium Phosphate, Polysorbate 60, Sodium Phosphate, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, Coumarin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cantu Basic Detangle Brush**: â­ Divide your hair into sections. â­ Start combing from the bottom to the top slowly until you reach the roots. â­ Repeat the previous step in each section. â­ Avoid detangling hair from the roots to avoid breakage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cantu Basic Detangle Brush**: â­ High-quality soft bristles. â­ Non-slip rubber handle. â­ Ergonomic design.

description_en:
**Cantu Ultra Glide Detangle Brush**: The perfect detangling brush for thick, curly hair. The **Cantu Ultra Glide Detangle Brush** features an innovative design that minimizes tangles and breakage. â­ Fewer bristles to reduce breakage. â­ Rubber base to define curls. â­ Non-slip grip for a stronger hold. â­ Easily glides through thick and curly hair.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Cantu Ultra Glide Detangle Brush**: â­ Divide hair into sections. â­ Start from the bottom and slowly work your way to the root. â­ Repeat in each section. â­ Avoid detangling from the root down to prevent breakage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Cantu Ultra Glide Detangle Brush**: â­ Soft bristles. â­ Rubber base. â­ Comfortable, non-slip handle.

**Carmex Cherry Lip Balm In Tube 10 gm** combines the classic Carmex formula with a delicious cherry flavor, and comes in a squeezable tube for easy application. Bursting with flavor, this balm soothes dry, cracked lips, leaving them soft and smooth. One of our most popular lip balms, it contains SPF 15 sun protection. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Carmex Cherry Lip Balm In Tube 10 gm**: 
â­ Apply as needed, directly to your lips.

description_en:
**Chamsy Hair Spray Ultra Hold 90 ml** is a luxurious hair spray carefully crafted with pro-vitamins that moisturize and nourish your hair while styling. Unlike other chemical sprays, **Chamsy Hair Spray Ultra Hold 90 ml** is non-sticky, long-lasting, and has a fast-drying formula. It makes styling your hair easier and safer.

â­ Provides 24-hour hold without stiffness or stickiness.
â­ Holds up in high humidity and is suitable for all climates.
â­ Professional's choice for amazing hairstyles.
â­ Delivers a stunning hairstyle in seconds.
â­ Comes in a 90ml spray bottle.
â­ Natural ingredients enriched with pro-vitamins for healthy, strong hair.
â­ Can be used on both wet and dry hair.
â­ Suitable for men and women.
â­ Safe for daily use without side effects.
â­ Non-toxic and ideal for all hair types.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Chamsy Hair Spray Ultra Hold 90 ml**:
â­ Use on clean hair.
â­ Separate hair strands before spraying.
â­ Spray all over your hair using your fingertips.
â­ Keep the spray bottle 30cm away from your scalp.
â­ One spray is usually sufficient, but you can reapply if needed.
â­ Can be used with a comb or your fingers for perfect styling.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Chamsy Hair Spray Ultra Hold 90 ml**:
â­ Pro-vitamins.
â­ Natural ingredients.

description_en:
**Clean & Clear Face Wash Skin Energising 150ml**. Is your morning skincare routine not waking up your skin? If you need a new way to refresh and energize your skin in the morning, then this face wash is for you! It's specially formulated to give your skin that extra brightness and feel more energised with citrus tangerine extract. **Clean & Clear Face Wash Skin Energising 150ml** contains exfoliating beads that invigorate your senses and awaken your skin. Use **Clean & Clear Face Wash Skin Energising 150ml** every day for bright, beautiful and clear skin!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clean & Clear Face Wash Skin Energising 150ml**:
â­ Wet face.
â­ Gently massage your face avoiding the eye area.
â­ Rinse your face thoroughly with water and pat dry with a towel.
â­ Use daily.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clean & Clear Face Wash Skin Energising 150ml**:
â­ Lemon and papaya extracts
â­ Oil-free
â­ Exfoliating beads

#facewash #cleanandclear #skincare #cleanser #facialcleanser #brightenskin #energizingskin #healthyskin #saudiarabia #beauty

description_en:
**Clean & Clear** Blackhead Clearing Daily Scrub is specially formulated to immediately peel away dirt and excess oil, starting to clear blackheads from the very first wash.  Featuring gentle exfoliating microbeads to remove dead skin, while a unique Quick Break-Up Complex deeply penetrates pores for blackhead removal and prevention. Use **Clean & Clear** daily for bright, clear skin!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clean & Clear** Face Scrub Blackhead Clearing:
â­ Apply daily to wet face.
â­ Gently massage, avoiding the eye area.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clean & Clear** Face Scrub Blackhead Clearing:
â­ [PR-016450]
â­ Aqua
â­ Cetyl Alcohol
â­ PPG-15 Stearyl Ether
â­ Cellulose
â­ Glycerin
â­ Polysorbate 60
â­ Salicylic Acid
â­ Cera Microcristallina
â­ Steareth-21
â­ Menthyl Lactate
â­ Potassium Cetyl Phosphate
â­ Xanthan Gum
â­ Disodium EDTA
â­ BHT
â­ Parfum
â­ CI 77510

description_en:
**Clean & Clear Face Wash Exfoliating 150ml** is an oil-free exfoliating daily face wash that leaves your skin beautifully smooth, clear, and soft from day 1. â­ Formulated with natural exfoliators to unblock pores and help prevent breakouts. â­ Effectively removes dirt, oil, and dead skin cells that can clog pores. â­ Gentle enough for daily use, even on sensitive skin. â­ Gives you bright, beautiful, and clear skin. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clean & Clear Face Wash Exfoliating 150ml**: â­ Apply to wet face. â­ Gently massage in circular motions. â­ Rinse thoroughly with water. â­ Avoid eye area. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clean & Clear Face Wash Exfoliating 150ml**: â­ Aqua, Glycerin, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cellulose, Lauryl Glucoside, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Hamamelis Virginiana Water, Alcohol, Laureth-4, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glycol Distearate, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Hydroxide, Citric Acid, Lactic Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Parfum.

description_en:
**Clean & Clear Fairness Face Cream SPF12 50ml** is an oil-free moisturiser that actively brightens and lightens the skin while protecting it from harmful sun damage. **Clean & Clear Fairness Face Cream SPF12 50ml** is clinically proven to deliver smoother skin after 2 weeks and visibly fairer skin after 4 weeks, and leaves your skin beautifully radiant and clear. Use **Clean & Clear Fairness Face Cream SPF12 50ml** every day for bright, beautiful and clear skin!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clean & Clear Fairness Face Cream SPF12 50ml**:
â­ After your cleansing routine, apply moisturiser evenly all over your face and neck.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clean & Clear Fairness Face Cream SPF12 50ml**:
â­ Aqua, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Cyclopentasiloxane, Titanium Dioxide (nano), Isohexadecane, Propylene Glycol, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Cetyl Alcohol, Stearic Acid, Cyclohexasiloxane, Stearyl Dimethicone, Dimethicone, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Portulaca Oleracea Extract, Tocopherol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Salicylic Acid, Aluminum Hydroxide, Palmitic Acid, Polysorbate 80, Butylene Glycol, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Carbomer, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Sodium Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Hydroxide, BHT, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Ethylparaben, Methylparaben, Phenoxyethanol, Propylparaben, Parfum.

description_en:
**Clean&Clear Shin Control Daily Facial Wash Lemongrass 150 ml** is a refreshing daily face wash that gently cleanses your skin, removing dirt, oil, and impurities. Its formula, enriched with lemongrass and fruit extracts, leaves your skin feeling clear and radiant all day long. Use it daily for bright, beautiful skin!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clean&Clear Shin Control Daily Facial Wash Lemongrass 150 ml**:
â­ Wet your face with water.
â­ Apply an appropriate amount of **Clean&Clear Shin Control Daily Facial Wash Lemongrass 150 ml** to your palm.
â­ Gently massage your face in circular motions, avoiding the eye area.
â­ Rinse your face thoroughly with cool water.
â­ Pat your face gently with a soft towel.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clean&Clear Shin Control Daily Facial Wash Lemongrass 150 ml**:
â­ Water
â­ Glycerin
â­ Sodium Laureth Sulfate
â­ Lemongrass Extract
â­ Fruit Extracts
â­ and other ingredients

description_en:
**Clean & Clear** Deep Action Refreshing Gel Cleanser is an oil-free, foamy, icy gel wash specially formulated to cleanse deep into pores to help prevent spots and breakouts. It gently and effectively removes dirt, oil, impurities, and makeup in one easy step, without over-drying your skin. Enriched with menthol for an instant cooling sensation, it leaves your skin clear, refreshed, and thoroughly cleansed. Use **Clean & Clear** daily for bright, healthy skin!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Clean & Clear**: 
â­ Wet your face with water.
â­ Gently massage the gel in small, circular motions, avoiding the eye area.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water and pat dry with a soft towel.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Clean & Clear**: 
â­ Aqua
â­ Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate
â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine
â­ Coco-Glucoside
â­ Sodium Chloride
â­ PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate
â­ Salicylic Acid
â­ Menthol
â­ Menthyl Lactate
â­ Benzophenone-4
â­ Sodium Citrate
â­ Potassium Lactate
â­ Sodium Sulfate
â­ Disodium EDTA
â­ Sodium Hydroxide
â­ Phenoxyethanol
â­ Methylparaben
â­ Ethylparaben
â­ Parfum
â­ CI 42090

description_en:
**Close Up** Toothpaste Active Gel Menthol Chill delivers amazingly fresh breath and white teeth with every brush.  Infused with an antibacterial mouthwash formula containing active zinc for up to 12 hours* of lasting fresh breath.  Boost your confidence with a naturally white smile. Brushing twice daily with **Close Up** toothpaste and a toothbrush protects your teeth and gums against bacteria buildup and bad breath. Enjoy the refreshing burst of flavor!

*Up to 12 hours of lasting fresh breath is based on an in-vivo study with regular use over 4 weeks.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Close Up**: 
â­ Do not swallow. Supervise children until capable of using without supervision.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Close Up**: 
â­ Antibacterial mouthwash formula.
â­ Active Zinc.
â­ Refreshing Menthol flavor.

Beat bad breath and yellow stains with our unique formula that delivers longer-lasting fresh breath and brighter, whiter teeth. This toothpaste features a perlite formula with extra teeth whitening power; it cleans teeth effectively and removes surface stains. Brush your teeth twice a day with **Close Up** toothpaste for confidence-boosting 12-hour fresh breath and a sparkling white smile.

description_en:
**Close Up** Icy White Menthol Burst Toothpaste delivers amazingly fresh breath and white teeth with every brush. Beat bad breath and yellow stains with our unique formula for longer-lasting fresh breath and brighter, whiter teeth.  It features a perlite formula with extra whitening power, leaving you with a shiny, bright smile.  **Close Up** toothpaste effectively cleans teeth and removes surface stains. Brush twice a day for confidence-boosting 12-hour fresh breath and a sparkling white smile.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Close Up**: 
â­ For external use only. 
â­ Do not swallow. 
â­ Children 6 years and younger: Use a pea-sized amount for supervised brushing to minimize swallowing. 
â­ If using fluoride from other sources, consult a dentist or doctor.

â­ Perlite

**Closeup Tp Chrcol Dtox & Cocnut 75ml** is a unique toothpaste that gives you a naturally whiter smile. It contains coconut essence and bamboo charcoal, giving you fresher breath and whiter teeth. It gently polishes away yellow stains and helps whiten your teeth naturally in just two weeks. Its formula is safe for enamel. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Closeup Tp Chrcol Dtox & Cocnut 75ml**:
â­ Apply a small amount of **Closeup Tp Chrcol Dtox & Cocnut 75ml** to your toothbrush.
â­ Brush your teeth in gentle circular motions for two minutes.
â­ Rinse your mouth thoroughly with water.
â­ Use twice daily for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Closeup Tp Chrcol Dtox & Cocnut 75ml**:
â­ Sorbitol
â­ Water

â­ Sodium Lauryl Sulphate

â­ Cocos Nucifera Extract

This gentle toothpaste naturally whitens your teeth thanks to its coconut and bamboo charcoal blend. Feel it working as it gently polishes away stains, revealing your naturally white smile without harming enamel. With a refreshing coconut flavor, you'll enjoy fresh breath and a dazzling smile! Try it now and see the difference in just two weeks.

description_en:
**Colour Me Sky Blue Eau de Toilette for Women - 100 ml**, a luxurious fragrance from Milton Lloyd, known for creating beautiful scents to suit all personalities. Whether you want a strong scent or a subtle fragrance, **Colour Me** has it all. They create every kind of scent to suit any individual.  **Colour Me Sky Blue** boasts a stunning floral fruity scent that grabs attention. It features citrus notes of lemon extracts, cherry, peach, jasmine, lily, and musk, making it incredibly refreshing. Its effect is mild yet long-lasting (6 hours). It's specially designed to make your day extra energetic and vibrant. It keeps you feeling rejuvenated and refreshed all day long. It leaves a magical impression on your personality.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colour Me Sky Blue Eau de Toilette for Women - 100 ml**: 
â­ Spray on wrists, pulse points, or the base of the neck. 
â­ Safe for use underarms and on clothing (avoid silk). 
â­ Keep out of reach of children and pets. 
â­ For external use only.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Colour Me Sky Blue Eau de Toilette for Women - 100 ml**: 
â­ Lemon extracts. 
â­ Cherry. 
â­ Peach. 
â­ Jasmine. 
â­ Lily. 
â­ Musk. 
â­ Amber. 
â­ Resin.

**Colour Me Pearl Eau de Toilette for Women - 100 ml** is an elegant and captivating fragrance that perfectly complements your unique personality. Its strong oriental scent makes you stand out wherever you go. Its long-lasting fragrance, keeping you refreshed for at least 6 hours, is ideal for your busy day. **Colour Me** can be easily sprayed on your clothes without leaving any stains.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colour Me Pearl Eau de Toilette for Women - 100 ml**
â­ Spray the perfume after showering on your moisturized skin.
â­ Hold the spray bottle 3-6 inches away from your body.
â­ Apply the perfume to your pulse points (neck, wrists, behind the ears).
â­ Avoid rubbing the perfume, as this may weaken its longevity.
â­ Do not over-spray the perfume.
â­ Keep the bottle tightly closed when not in use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colour Me Purple Eau de Toilette for Women - 100 ml**:

description_en:
**Colour Me Gold Eau de Toilette for Men - 90 ml** is a luxurious fragrance that adds a touch of elegance and confidence to your personality. Its strong and oriental scent makes you stand out anywhere. Its long-lasting fragrance keeps you refreshed throughout the day. Easy to use, and can be sprayed on clothes without leaving any stains.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colour Me Gold Eau de Toilette for Men - 90 ml**:
â­ Apply the perfume to your skin right after showering.
â­ Hold the bottle 3-6 inches away from your body when spraying.
â­ Focus on pulse points (neck, wrists, behind the ears).
â­ Avoid rubbing the perfume after application.
â­ Don't over-spray the perfume.
â­ Store the perfume in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Colour Me Gold Eau de Toilette for Men - 90 ml**:
â­ Oriental fragrance ingredients.
â­ Natural fragrance oils.

This colorless perfume doesnâ€™t stain.

description_en:
**Colour Me White Eau de Toilette for Men - 90 ml** is a luxurious men's fragrance from Milton-Lloyd, a British brand renowned for its high quality and long-lasting perfumes. This fragrance features a refreshing scent combining citrus and fruity top notes, with a floral and woody touch, and a base of leather, vanilla, and musk. It comes in a stylish 90ml bottle, perfect for travel.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colour Me White Eau de Toilette for Men - 90 ml**:
â­ Spray the fragrance directly onto your skin.
â­ For longer lasting fragrance, apply to pulse points (such as wrists and behind the ears).
â­ Allow to air dry.
â­ You can also lightly spray on your clothing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Colour Me White Eau de Toilette for Men - 90 ml**:
â­ Coumarin (91-64-5)
â­ Hydroxycitronellal (107-75-5)
â­ Farnesol (101-86-0)
â­ Linalool (78-70-6)
â­ Methyl 2-Octynoate (Methyl Heptine Carbonate) (111-12-6)

description_en:
**Colour Me Perfumerâ€™s Choice Valerie No 8 EDP Women 83 ml** is a strong oriental fragrance that leaves a lasting impression. Its long-lasting scent, up to 6 hours, makes it perfect for any occasion. It can be sprayed on both white and colored clothes without leaving any stains. It boosts your confidence and adds an elegant touch to your style. It comes in a sleek and lightweight bottle.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Colour Me Perfumerâ€™s Choice Valerie No 8 EDP Women 83 ml**: 
â­ Apply the perfume after showering on dry skin to ensure longer-lasting fragrance.
â­ Hold the spray bottle 3-6 inches away from the body.
â­ Apply the perfume to pulse points (chest, neck, wrists, behind ears).
â­ Avoid rubbing the perfume, as it may weaken the scent.
â­ Don't overspray the perfume.
â­ Keep the bottle tightly closed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Colour Me Perfumerâ€™s Choice Valerie No 8 EDP Women 83 ml**: (This list will be updated later once the exact ingredient information is available.)

**Crest 3D White Professional Effects 40 Strips** are the perfect solution for a brighter, whiter smile. â­ Removes years of teeth stains in just 1 hour for a noticeably whiter smile. â­ Whitens teeth faster than ever, even when you're short on time. â­ Advanced Seal Technology provides a no-slip grip so you can talk and drink water while whitening. â­ Uses the same enamel-safe whitening ingredients dentists use. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Crest 3D White Professional Effects 40 Strips**: â­ Follow the included instructions carefully. â­ Wear the strips for 30 minutes daily. â­ Avoid contact with gums.

**Crest Toothpaste 3d White Brilliance Pearl Glow 75 Ml** is an effective and enamel-safe toothpaste. â­ Removes up to 100% of surface stains in 5 days. â­ Provides 24-hour stain protection. â­ Unique formula containing natural pearl extract for a radiant smile. â­ Refreshing mint flavor.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Crest Toothpaste 3d White Brilliance Pearl Glow 75 Ml**: 
â­ Apply a small amount of **Crest Toothpaste 3d White Brilliance Pearl Glow 75 Ml** to your toothbrush. â­ Brush your teeth using gentle circular motions for two minutes. â­ Rinse your mouth thoroughly. â­ Use twice daily for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Crest Toothpaste 3d White Brilliance Pearl Glow 75 Ml**: 
â­ Natural pearl extract. â­ Enamel-safe ingredients. â­ Stain-dissolving particles. â­ Refreshing mint flavor.

description_en:
**Crest Toothpaste White Brilliance Intense 75Ml** is a high-performance toothpaste that removes up to 100% of surface stains in just 3 days! **Crest Toothpaste White Brilliance Intense 75Ml** gives you a noticeably brighter, whiter smile.  Formulated with an enamel-safe formula, it helps prevent cavities and tartar buildup with a long-lasting fresh taste.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Crest Toothpaste White Brilliance Intense 75Ml**:
â­ Use a pea-sized amount twice daily.
â­ Brush for at least two minutes each time.
â­ Children under 6: Use a small amount under direct supervision to minimize swallowing.
â­ If you are using fluoride from other sources, consult a dentist or doctor.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Crest Toothpaste White Brilliance Intense 75Ml**:
â­ Glycerin
â­ Hydrated Silica
â­ Sodium Hexametaphosphate
â­ Aqua
â­ peg-6
â­ Aroma
â­ Silica
â­ Sodium Lauryl Sulfate
â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine
â­ Trisodium Phosphate
â­ Mica
â­ Chondrus Crispus Powder
â­ Sodium Saccharin
â­ peg-20m
â­ Sodium Fluoride
â­ Xanthan Gum
â­ Sodium Chloride
â­ Cl 77891
â­ Sucralose
â­ Limonene
â­ Sodium Benzoate
â­ Cl 74160

description_en:
**Crest 3D Whitestrips 1 Hour Express Whitening - 20 Strips** is a teeth whitening treatment designed to remove years of stains in just one hour. â­ Fast-acting: Noticeably whiten your teeth in just one hour. â­ Convenient: Easy to apply and remove strips, perfect for busy schedules. â­ Enamel-safe: Uses the same whitening ingredient as dentists, specially designed to protect enamel. â­ Results that last up to 12 weeks: With regular use. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Crest 3D Whitestrips 1 Hour Express Whitening - 20 Strips**: â­ Brush and dry your teeth. â­ Apply one strip to your upper teeth, aligning the gel with your gum line. â­ Repeat with the lower strip. â­ Leave the strips on for one hour. â­ Gently peel off the strips. â­ Rinse your mouth with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Crest 3D Whitestrips 1 Hour Express Whitening - 20 Strips**: â­ Polyvinylpyrrolidone (thickener) â­ Carbomer (adhesive) â­ Hydrogen Peroxide (whitening agent) â­ Sodium Hydroxide (pH adjuster) â­ Flavorings

description_en:
**Dabur Amla** Gold, an improved formula of the popular classic **Dabur Amla** Hair Oil, enriched with Amla, Almond, and Henna. Perfect for dry, damaged, and chemically treated hair.  Gives your hair irresistible length, strength, smoothness, and shine. For silky, soft hair.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Amla**:
â­ Wash your hair thoroughly before use.
â­ Apply an appropriate amount of **Dabur Amla** oil to your scalp and hair.
â­ Gently massage your scalp in circular motions.
â­ Leave it on for at least 30 minutes before washing.
â­ Use regularly for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Amla**:
â­ Amla
â­ Almond
â­ Henna

description_en:
**Dabur Herbal Toothpaste Charcoal - 150g + Free Toothbrush** for a brighter, whiter smile! This activated charcoal toothpaste from **Dabur Herbal** combines activated charcoal, refreshing ginger, and warming long and black pepper to whiten teeth and prevent staining. Activated charcoal reduces bad breath and plaque, while removing surface stains without harming enamel. It's free from fluoride, peroxide, and triclosan.  Comes with an eco-friendly bamboo toothbrush.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dabur Herbal Toothpaste Charcoal - 150g + Free Toothbrush**:
â­ Apply a suitable amount to your toothbrush.
â­ Brush your teeth thoroughly.
â­ Try to minimize swallowing.
â­ Use twice daily.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dabur Herbal Toothpaste Charcoal - 150g + Free Toothbrush**:
â­ Calcium Carbonate
â­ Aqua
â­ Glycerine
â­ Herbal extracts
â­ Silica
â­ Sodium lauryl Sulphate
â­ Carrageenan
â­ Flavour containing basil oil

#DaburHerbal #Toothpaste #ActivatedCharcoal #TeethWhitening #OralHealth #DentalCare #TeethBeauty #Toothbrush #DaburProducts #SaudiArabia

It strengthens your teeth, improves gum health, and gives you fresh breath. Its anti-inflammatory, antifungal, and antibacterial properties protect your teeth and gums. **Dabur Herbal Toothpaste Blackseed -150g + Free Toothbrush** is free from fluoride, peroxide, and triclosan. It comes with a free toothbrush.

â­ Brush your teeth thoroughly.

description_en:
**Dr. Althea Resveratrol 345 Intensive Repair Cream 50ml** is a regenerating ointment gel cream rich in nutrients that skillfully combines ingredients to address blemishes, nourish the skin, and provide soothing care, resulting in a well-rounded skincare solution. This lightweight post-acne cream effectively tends to acne aftermath without a heavy feel. Its multi-layered cream structure offers thorough and lasting skincare by catering to various skin needs, ensuring continuous hydration and nourishment.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dr. Althea Resveratrol 345 Intensive Repair Cream 50ml**:
â­ Wash your face with a gentle cleanser suited for your skin type.
â­ Apply less viscous skincare products like toner first.
â­ Apply an adequate amount of **Dr. Althea Resveratrol 345 Intensive Repair Cream 50ml** as your final or semi-final step in your skincare routine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dr. Althea Resveratrol 345 Intensive Repair Cream 50ml**:
â­ WATER, PROPANEDIOL, GLYCERIN, CYCLOHEXASILOXANE, 1,2-HEXANEDIOL, NIACINAMIDE, CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC, TRIGLYCERIDE, POLYGLYCERIN-3, PANTHENOL, POLYGLYCERYL-10 STEARATE, HYDROGENATED POLYDECENE, HYDROGENATED POLY(C6-14 OLEFIN), DICAPRYLYL CARBONATE, AMMONIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYLTAURATE/VP COPOLYMER, C14-22 ALCOHOLS, POLYMETHYLSILSESQUIOXANE, C12-20 ALKYL GLUCOSIDE, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, ACRYLATES/C10-30 ALKYL ACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, POLYQUATERNIUM-51, TROMETHAMINE, SODIUM HYALURONATE, COPTIS JAPONICA ROOT EXTRACT, HOUTTUYNIA CORDATA EXTRACT, OENOTHERA BIENNIS (EVENING PRIMROSE) FLOWER EXTRACT, BETA-GLUCAN, RESVERATROL, GARDENIA FLORIDA FRUIT EXTRACT, LAVANDULA ANGUSTIFOLIA (LAVENDER) FLOWER EXTRACT, OPUNTIA FICUS-INDICA STEM EXTRACT, HYDROLYZED HYALURONIC ACID, CENTELLA ASIATICA LEAF EXTRACT, PHENOXYETHANOL, HIBISCUS SABDARIFFA FLOWER EXTRACT, TOCOPHEROL, CORALLINA OFFICINALIS EXTRACT, CERAMIDE NP

title_ar: **Ø¯ÙƒØªÙˆØ± Ø§Ù„Ø«ÙŠØ§ ÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ… 147 Ù…Ù‡Ø¯Ø¦ ÙˆÙ…Ø±Ø·Ø¨ 50 Ù…Ù„**
description_en:
**Dr. Althea Resveratrol 147 Intensive Soothing Cream 50ml** is an advanced skincare product designed to enhance your skin barrier, nourish, and deeply hydrate. â­ Features a patented Paeonia Albiflora Flower Extract. â­ Rich in nourishing ingredients like avocado fruit extract and Tocopherol. â­ Seven-layered hyaluronic acid composition for effective moisturization. â­ Promotes skin plumpness and reduces signs of aging. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dr. Althea Resveratrol 147 Intensive Soothing Cream 50ml**: 
â­ Wash your face with a gentle cleanser. â­ Apply less viscous skincare products first. â­ Apply an adequate amount of **Dr. Althea Resveratrol 147 Intensive Soothing Cream 50ml** as your final or semi-final step in your routine. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dr. Althea Resveratrol 147 Intensive Soothing Cream 50ml**: 
â­ WATER, GLYCERIN, DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, METHYL TRIMETHICONE, HYDROGENATED POLYDECENE, 1,2-HEXANEDIOL, PHENYL TRIMETHICONE, VEGETABLE OIL, DIMETHICONE/VINYL DIMETHICONE CROSSPOLYMER, GLYCERYL STEARATE SE, COPTIS JAPONICA ROOT EXTRACT, ARTEMISIA PRINCEPS LEAF EXTRACT, PERSEA GRATISSIMA (AVOCADO) FRUIT EXTRACT, BRASSICA OLERACEA ACEPHALA LEAF EXTRACT, HYDROLYZED GARDENIA FLORIDA EXTRACT, PAEONIA ALBIFLORA FLOWER EXTRACT, HYDROGENATED LECITHIN, SODIUM HYALURONATE, CETEARYL OLIVATE, PALMITIC ACID, SORBITAN OLIVATE, C12-16 ALCOHOLS, BEHENYL ALCOHOL, STEARIC ACID, MICROCRYSTALLINE CELLULOSE, CETEARYL GLUCOSIDE, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, AMMONIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYLTAURATE/VP COPOLYMER, POLYGLYCERYL-10 MYRISTATE, GLYCERYL POLYMETHACRYLATE, CELLULOSE GUM, CHOLESTEROL, CERAMIDE NP, DISODIUM EDTA, GLYCERYL STEARATE, METHYLPROPANEDIOL, MALTODEXTRIN, GUAIAZULENE, CERAMIDE AS, CERAMIDE AP, ARGININE, CARBOMER, CERAMIDE NS, CERAMIDE NG, TOCOPHEROL, DIMETHYLSILANOL HYALURONATE, HYDROLYZED SODIUM HYALURONATE, HYDROLYZED HYALURONIC ACID, POTASSIUM HYALURONATE, HYALURONIC ACID, SODIUM HYALURONATE CROSSPOLYMER, HYDROXYPROPYLTRIMONIUM HYALURONATE, SODIUM HYALURONATE DIMETHYLSILANOL, SODIUM ACETYLATED HYALURONATE, CERAMIDE EOP.

description_en:
**Dr. Althea Deep Cleansing And Moisturizing Balm 50ml** is a gentle, deep cleansing and moisturizing balm, perfect for sensitive skin. â­ Its unique formula with 14 essential ingredients deeply cleanses without drying. â­ Hygienic grinding mechanism for easy portion control. â­ Effectively removes sunscreen, makeup, and waterproof products. â­ Enriched with Camellia Seed Oil and Grape Seed Oil to moisturize and rejuvenate. â­ Contains Madecassoside and Centella Extract to soothe skin and reduce redness and irritation. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dr. Althea Deep Cleansing And Moisturizing Balm 50ml**: 
â­ Turn the product clockwise to dispense the appropriate amount. â­ Gently massage in a circular motion to dissolve makeup. â­ Gradually add water to emulsify. â­ Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dr. Althea Deep Cleansing And Moisturizing Balm 50ml**: 
â­ Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, â­ Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, â­ PEG-20 Glyceryl Triisostearate, â­ Synthetic Wax, â­ PEG-10 Isostearate, â­ Sorbitan Sesquioleate, â­ Camellia Sinensis Seed Oil, â­ Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, â­ Madecassoside, â­ Centella Asiatica Extract, â­ Asiaticoside, â­ Water, â­ Caprylyl Glycol, â­ Ethylhexylglycerin

description_en:
**Dr. Althea Vitamin C Serum For Skin Lightening 20% 30ml** is a highly effective serum rich in Vitamin C. â­Brightens and evens skin tone. â­Reduces the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines. â­Deeply hydrates and increases skin elasticity. â­Contains effective natural ingredients. â­Gives skin a natural glow and radiance. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dr. Althea Vitamin C Serum For Skin Lightening 20% 30ml**: 
â­Cleanse your face thoroughly. 
â­Apply an appropriate amount of serum to your skin. 
â­Gently massage until fully absorbed. 
â­Use morning and evening. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dr. Althea Vitamin C Serum For Skin Lightening 20% 30ml**: 
â­HIPPOPHAE RHAMNOIDES WATER,CENTELLA ASIATICA LEAF WATER,NIACINAMIDE,BUTYLENE GLYCOL,1,2-HEXANEDIOL,DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL,WATER,METHYL GLUCETH-20,METHYLPROPANEDIOL,BETAINE,TRANEXAMIC ACID,GLYCERIN,PENTYLENE GLYCOL,PROPANEDIOL,HYDROXYETHYL UREA,LAMINARIA JAPONICA,EXTRACT,ECLIPTA PROSTRATA LEAF EXTRACT,FICUS CARICA (FIG) FRUIT EXTRACT,CENTELLA ASIATICA EXTRACT,HYDROGENATED LECITHIN,SODIUM HYALURONATE,CARBOMER,3-O-ETHYL ASCORBIC ACID,C12-14 PARETH-12,AMMONIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYLTAURATE/VP COPOLYMER,XANTHAN GUM,TROMETHAMINE,PANTHENOL,ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN,ADENOSINE,DISODIUM EDTA,FRUCTOOLIGOSACCHARIDES,BETA-GLUCAN,ASCORBIC, ACID,HYDROLYZED HYALURONIC ACID,CERAMIDE NP,ALPHA-ARBUTIN,TOCOPHEROL,BIFIDA FERMENT LYSATE,BISABOLOL,UBIQUINONE,HYDROXYDECYL UBIQUINONE,SODIUM ACETYLATED HYALURONATE.

description_en:
**Dr. Althea Vitamin C Serum For Skin Lightening 63% 30ml** is a luxurious serum focusing on revitalizing your skin from within. â­ Brightens and deeply hydrates skin. â­ Improves dull and uneven skin tone. â­ Contains 63% Hippophae Rhamnoides Water rich in Vitamin C. â­ Suitable for sensitive skin. â­ Soothes tired skin. â­ Free of artificial fragrances and colors. â­ Absorbs easily. â­ Ideal for use before makeup or bedtime.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Dr. Althea Vitamin C Serum For Skin Lightening 63% 30ml**: 
â­ Cleanse your face with lukewarm water and a gentle cleanser. â­ Apply a toner to refine your skin. â­ Dispense a small amount of **Dr. Althea Vitamin C Serum For Skin Lightening 63% 30ml** onto your face. â­ Gently massage from the center outwards. â­ Use sunscreen during the day.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Dr. Althea Vitamin C Serum For Skin Lightening 63% 30ml**:
â­ Hippophae Rhamnoides Water, â­ Centella Asiatica Leaf Water, â­ Niacinamide, â­ Butylene Glycol, â­ 1,2-Hexanediol, â­ and other effective natural ingredients.

description_en:
**Embryolisse Lait Creme Concentred 75 ml** is a beauty secret favored by dermatologists and makeup artists for decades. This cream provides deep hydration and nourishment thanks to its rich blend of essential fatty acids and vitamins. It retains skin moisture, protects against external aggressors, and restores suppleness and radiance. Its creamy, comfortable texture suits even dry skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Embryolisse Lait Creme Concentred 75 ml**: 
â­ Apply a small amount to clean, dry skin in the morning as a makeup base or moisturizer. 
â­ Use generously as a cleanser morning and evening. 
â­ Use as a moisturizing mask by applying a thick layer.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Embryolisse Lait Creme Concentred 75 ml**: 
â­ AQUA (WATER). 
â­ PARAFFINUM LIQUIDUM. 
â­ STEARIC ACID. 
â­ PALMITIC ACID. 
â­ GLYCERYL STEARATE SE. 
â­ TRIETHANOLAMINE. 
â­ CERA ALBA (BEESWAX). 
â­ CETYL PALMITATE. 
â­ BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII (SHEA) BUTTER. 
â­ 1,2-HEXANEDIOL. 
â­ CAPRYLYL GLYCOL. 
â­ STEARETH-10. 
â­ POLYACRYLAMIDE. 
â­ C13-14 ISOPARAFFIN. 
â­ PARFUM (FRAGRANCE). 
â­ LAURETH-7. 
â­ PROPYLENE GLYCOL. 
â­ TROPOLONE. 
â­ HYDROLYZED SOY PROTEIN. 
â­ ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF EXTRACT.

**Embryolisse Filaderme** is a nourishing and effective cream for dry skin. â­Nourishes the skin with essential nutrients. â­Rehydrates and reconstructs skin cells. â­Strengthens the skin barrier. â­Reduces dryness, leaving skin soft, radiant, and supple. â­Natural formula rich in shea butter, beeswax, aloe vera, and soy proteins. â­Paraben-free. â­Dermatologically tested. â­Formulated to minimize the risk of allergic reactions.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Embryolisse Filaderme**: â­Apply to clean, dry skin of the face and neck morning and evening. â­Spread gently and allow to fully absorb.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Embryolisse Filaderme**: â­Emollient oil, â­Shea butter, â­Beeswax, â­Aloe vera, â­Soy proteins.

**Embryolisse** Gentle Waterproof Make-Up Remover Milk is a luxurious creamy makeup remover perfect for all skin types. It comes in an elegant 200ml metal bottle. â­ Effectively removes makeup without the need for water. â­ Gentle creamy texture on the skin. â­ Suitable for sensitive skin. â­ Dermatologically and ophthalmologically tested. â­ Fragrance-free. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Embryolisse**: 
â­ Apply an appropriate amount of **Embryolisse** to a cotton pad or your fingertips. â­ Gently massage onto the face, eyes, and neck. â­ Wipe gently to remove makeup. â­ Avoid direct contact with eyes. â­ Store away from direct heat. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Embryolisse**: 
â­ Aloe vera â­ Patagonia root â­ Gentle skin-loving ingredients

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Embryolisse Eau De Beaute Rosamelis Toner 200 Ml**:

â­ Hamamelis. 
â­ Paraben-free. 
â­ Dermatologically and ophthalmologically tested.

**Essence Lash Princess False Lash Effect Mascara** Black delivers the ultimate volume and length for stunning lashes. â­ Adds incredible volume without looking dramatic. â­ Lightweight formula won't weigh down your lashes. â­ Perfect for everyday wear or special occasions. â­ Long-lasting, smudge-proof and flake-proof formula. â­ Compact size for easy portability. â­ Conical fiber brush for effortless application. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Lash Princess False Lash Effect Mascara**: â­ Apply starting at the base of your lashes. â­ Wiggle the wand back and forth. â­ Add more coats for desired length and volume.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Lash Princess False Lash Effect Mascara**: â­ aqua (water), cera alba (beeswax), paraffin, glyceryl stearate, oryza sativa (rice) bran wax, butylene glycol, palmitic acid, acacia senegal gum , polybutene, copernicia cerifera (carnauba) wax, aminomethyl propanol, stearic acid, vp/eicosene copolymer, tocopherol, hydroxyethylcellulose, dimethicone, polyester-4, ethylhexylglycerin, sodium nitrate, phenoxyethanol, potassium sorbate, ci 77499 (iron oxides)

description_en:
**Essence Lash & Brow Gel Mascara Transparent** perfectly shapes and accentuates your brows. It provides a soft, natural finish and long-lasting results.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Lash & Brow Gel Mascara Transparent**:
â­ Start at the outer edge of the brow.
â­ Brush across to the inner corner, against the hair growth.
â­ Brush the brows in the other direction, shaping them into place.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Lash & Brow Gel Mascara Transparent**:
â­ Caprylic/capric triglyceride
â­ Aluminum starch octenylsuccinate
â­ Talc
â­ C12-15 alkyl benzoate
â­ Cetearyl ethylhexanoate
â­ Polyethylene
â­ Hydrogenated castor oil
â­ Silica

â­ Isododecane
â­ Isopropyl myristate
â­ Disteardimonium hectorite
â­ Propylene carbonate
â­ Iron oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)
â­ Titanium dioxide (CI 77891)

**Essence Baby Got Blush 30** is a bronze blush and bronzer stick with a soft, creamy texture that's easy to apply. It gives you a natural, fresh glow. Its practical stick format makes it perfect for your handbag, for everyday use or to touch up your makeup anytime. Enjoy a radiant and healthy complexion with **Essence Baby Got Blush 30**.

â­ Use daily or as needed.

description_en:
**Essence Eyeliner Pen Waterproof 01 - Black**, effortless application for precise and defined eyes. â­ Easily create thin or dramatic lines. â­Our waterproof and smudge-proof formula lasts all day long, even on rainy days or during workouts. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Eyeliner Pen Waterproof 01 - Black**:
â­For a subtle line, lightly brush the tip across the base of your lash line from the inner to the outer corner. 
â­For best results, get as close to your lash line as possible. 
â­To create a cat eye, draw the outer border, starting from the outer edge and then fill in with the liner. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Eyeliner Pen Waterproof 01 - Black**:
â­Aqua (water) â­Styrene/acrylates copolymer â­Alcohol denat. â­Methylpropanediol â­Ceteareth-25 â­Sorbitol â­Sodium carbonate â­Lactobacillus ferment â­Panthenol â­Gellan gum â­Xylitylglucoside â­Anhydroxylitol â­Xylitol â­Isopropyl alcohol â­Simethicone â­Phenoxyethanol â­Methylparaben â­CI 77266 (black 2).

Stylish, retractable design; an essential tool for any makeup bag. Helps you achieve a trendy, smoky look; the intense color is always impressive. Innovative twist mechanism for quick application. Creates a smooth line that can be blended. Excellent staying power with a smooth texture for easy application and long-lasting effects. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Long Lasting Eye Pencil 01 - Black**: 
â­ Apply **Essence Long Lasting Eye Pencil 01 - Black** along the lash and waterline of the eye. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Long Lasting Eye Pencil 01 - Black**: 
â­ Cyclopentasiloxane, synthetic beeswax, cera microcristallina (microcrystalline wax), mica, trimethylsiloxysilicate, myristyl lactate, c30-45 alkyl cetearyl dimethicone crosspolymer, myristyl alcohol, tocopherol, lecithin, ascorbyl palmitate, glyceryl stearate, magnesium silicate, glyceryl oleate, citric acid, ci 77499 (iron oxides), ci 77510 (ferric ferrocyanide).

description_en:
**Essence** Instant Volume & Length Mascara Ultra Black: Get noticeably voluminous and longer lashes with **Essence** Instant Volume & Length Mascara.  It features a lightweight formula and intense black pigment to completely transform your look. Designed to reach every lash, even the shortest ones, for a flawless result. Its formula allows you to modulate the intensity by applying one or more coats.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence** Instant Volume & Length Mascara Ultra Black:
â­ Apply one or more coats to your lashes from root to tip.
â­ Allow the mascara to dry before applying another coat.
â­ Remove with a suitable makeup remover.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence** Instant Volume & Length Mascara Ultra Black:
â­ AQUA (WATER)
â­ PARAFFIN
â­ RHUS VERNICIFLUA PEEL CERA (RHUS VERNICIFLUA PEEL WAX)
â­ GLYCERYL STEARATE SE
â­ ACACIA SENEGAL GUM
â­ BUTYLENE GLYCOL
â­ VP/EICOSENE COPOLYMER
â­ PALMITIC ACID
â­ STEARIC ACID
â­ ORYZA SATIVA (RICE) BRAN WAX
â­ SHOREA ROBUSTA RESIN
â­ HELIANTHUS ANNUUS (SUNFLOWER) SEED OIL
â­ PVP
â­ SIMMONDSIA CHINENSIS (JOJOBA) SEED OIL
â­ TOCOPHERYL ACETATE
â­ TOCOPHEROL
â­ ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN
â­ CAPRYLYL GLYCOL
â­ HYDROXYETHYLCELLULOSE
â­ PRUNUS AMYGDALUS DULCIS (SWEET ALMOND) OIL
â­ TRIMETHYL PENTANYL DIISOBUTYRATE
â­ DISODIUM PHOSPHATE
â­ SODIUM PHOSPHATE
â­ POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE
â­ PHENOXYETHANOL
â­ CI 77499 (IRON OXIDES).

description_en:
**Essence Make Me Brow Eyebrow Gel Mascara 02- Dark** is a tinted gel formula containing tiny fibers that fill in gaps to create fuller, more defined eyebrows. The perfectly sized fiber brush shapes and tames brows to perfection.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Make Me Brow Eyebrow Gel Mascara 02- Dark**:
â­ Brush upward through brows.
â­ Continue to build product until desired intensity is achieved.

description_en:
**Essence Banana Loose Powder - Yellow**, with its ultra-fine powder in a soft yellow shade, is perfect for adding matte highlights above the cheekbones, on the forehead, the bridge of the nose, or on the cupid's bow of the lips. It's also suitable for setting make-up and for the concealer baking technique. The weightless texture is formulated without mineral oil and talc - for a pleasantly light feeling on the skin. It comes with a sponge so you can refresh your look whenever you need to.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Banana Loose Powder - Yellow**:
â­ Use a face brush or sponge to apply the powder to the face to set makeup.
â­ Perfect for adding matte highlights.
â­ Lightweight formula free of mineral oil and talc.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Banana Loose Powder - Yellow**:
â­ Mica
â­ Silica
â­ Vinyl dimethicone/methicone silsesquioxane crosspolymer
â­ Tocopheryl acetate
â­ Ethylhexylglycerin
â­ Phenoxyethanol
â­ CI 77491, CI 77492 (Iron oxides).

â­ Ethyl acetate

It's paraben-free and alcohol-free, making it gentle on sensitive skin. The dual-ended applicator features a precise tip for lashes and a wider brush for brows. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Lash & Brow Growth Serum**:
â­ Apply a small amount of **Essence Lash & Brow Growth Serum** to your lashes and brows daily before bed.
â­ Use the precise tip for lashes and the wider brush for brows.
â­ For best results, use consistently for at least 8 weeks.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Lash & Brow Growth Serum**:
â­ Aqua (water)
â­ Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil
â­ Panthenol
â­ Nephelium Lappaceum Seed Extract
â­ Camellia Japonica Seed Oil
â­ Camellia Sinensis Seed Oil
â­ Camellia Japonica Flower Extract
â­ Hydroxyacetophenone
â­ Schisandra Chinensis Fruit Extract
â­ Biotinoyl Tripeptide-1

description_en:
**Essence Skin Lovin' Sensitive Concealer** is the perfect beauty all-rounder for a flawless complexion. It easily hides spots, redness, and under-eye circles. Its lightweight, non-comedogenic formula is barely noticeable and nourishes the skin with moisturizing aloe vera.  The coverage of **Essence Skin Lovin' Sensitive Concealer** is buildable, from medium to high.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Skin Lovin' Sensitive Concealer**:
â­ Using the applicator, apply to dark circles, blemishes, or other problem areas.
â­ Blend concealer with a sponge or brush, then set with powder if desired.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Skin Lovin' Sensitive Concealer**:
â­ Aqua (water), isononyl isononanoate, coconut alkanes, glycerin, triethylhexanoin, magnesium sulfate, polyglyceryl-4 diisostearate/polyhydroxystearate/sebacate, diisostearoyl polyglyceryl-3 dimer dilinoleate, disteardimonium hectorite, aloe barbadensis leaf juice, stearoyl inulin, propylene carbonate, ethylhexylglycerin, hydrogenated lecithin, magnesium oxide, aluminum hydroxide, alumina, phenoxyethanol, potassium sorbate, sodium benzoate, ci 77491 (iron oxides), ci 77492 (iron oxides), ci 77499 (iron oxides), ci 77891 (titanium dioxide).

description_en:
**Essence 24Ever Ink Liner 01 - Black**:  Deep black liquid eyeliner proven to last up to 24 hours.  Its precise tip provides an easy grip for effortless application to the lash line. Vegan formula, paraben-free, alcohol-free, perfume-free, and waterproof.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence 24Ever Ink Liner 01 - Black**:
â­ Use the applicator brush to gently draw your desired line onto your eyelids.
â­ Remove the product with an oil-based eye cleanser.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence 24Ever Ink Liner 01 - Black**:
â­ Aqua (water)
â­ Methylpropanediol
â­ Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer
â­ Styrene/Acrylates/Ammonium Methacrylate Copolymer
â­ Cellulose
â­ Peg-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil
â­ Coco-Glucoside
â­ Poloxamer 407
â­ Phenylpropanol

â­ Sodium Laureth-12 Sulfate
â­ Sodium Lauryl Sulfate
â­ BHT
â­ Citric Acid
â­ Phenoxyethanol
â­ Potassium Sorbate
â­ Sodium Benzoate
â­ Sodium Dehydroacetate
â­ CI 77266 (Black 2) (nano).

description_en:
**Essence Wow What A Brow Pen Waterproof 03** is perfect for defined and bushy eyebrows. This waterproof eyebrow pencil will make your eyebrows last longer. Its retractable mine, shaped like a water droplet, is ideal for filling in the eyebrows and providing a natural finish. It also contains a spoolie at the other end to perfectly blend and integrate the product.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Wow What A Brow Pen Waterproof 03**:
â­ Start by drawing a thin line along the shape of your natural eyebrows.
â­ Use the flat edge to fill in any gaps.
â­ Use the spoolie to brush your eyebrows and blend the product naturally.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Wow What A Brow Pen Waterproof 03**:
â­ EUPHORBIA CERIFERA (CANDELILLA) WAX
â­ RICINUS COMMUNIS (CASTOR) SEED OIL
â­ OCTYLDODECANOL
â­ CALCIUM CARBONATE
â­ COPERNICIA CERIFERA (CARNAUBA) WAX
â­ SYNTHETIC FLUORPHLOGOPITE
â­ OLEA EUROPAEA (OLIVE) OIL UNSAPONIFIABLES
â­ OLEA EUROPAEA (OLIVE) FRUIT OIL
â­ HYDROGENATED OLIVE OIL
â­ GLYCERYL CAPRYLATE
â­ SYNTHETIC BEESWAX
â­ PENTAERYTHRITYL TETRA-DI-T-BUTYL HYDROXYHYDROCINNAMATE
â­ ALUMINUM HYDROXIDE

â­ CI 77491 (IRON OXIDES)
â­ CI 77492 (IRON OXIDES)

description_en:
**Essence Lash Without Limits** Mascara delivers incredibly long and voluminous lashes! Its innovative, flexible elastomer brush reaches even the shortest lashes. Ophthalmologically tested and suitable for contact lens wearers.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Lash Without Limits** Mascara:
â­ Apply one or more coats of mascara to your lashes from root to tip.
â­ Allow mascara to dry before applying another coat.
â­ To remove, use a suitable makeup remover.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Lash Without Limits** Mascara:
â­ Aqua (Water), Paraffin, Glyceryl Stearate, Synthetic Beeswax, Stearic Acid, Acacia Senegal Gum, Butylene Glycol, Palmitic Acid, Polybutene, Oryza Sativa Cera (Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax), Vp/Eicosene Copolymer, Ozokerite, Aminomethyl Propanol, Tropolone, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Stearyl Stearate, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Disodium Phosphate, Polysorbate 60, Sodium Phosphate, Phenoxyethanol, Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides).

**Essence Kajal Pencil 04 - White**: Line and define! This classic kajal eye pencil applies smoothly and is easy to blend. â­ Get mesmerizing and stunning eyes with kajal pencils. â­ Create fashionable looks with **Essence Kajal Pencil 04 - White**. â­ Super-steady hold pencil style and creamy consistency, suitable for both the waterline as well as the lash line.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Kajal Pencil 04 - White**: â­ Apply to the lash and waterline of the eye. â­ Keep the cap closed at all times. â­ Store in a cool, dry place. â­ Start by applying the kajal on the upper eyelid by closing the eyes. â­ Draw a soft line from the outer corner to the inner corner of the eye.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Kajal Pencil 04 - White**: â­ Hydrogenated Coconut Oil, Mica, Hydrogenated Palm Kernel Glycerides, Cera Microcristallina (Microcrystalline Wax), Hydrogenated Palm Glycerides, Myristyl Myristate, Rhus Succedanea Fruit Wax, Behenyl Alcohol, Hydrogenated Coco-Glycerides, Cetyl Palmitate, Carnauba (Copernicia Cerifera) Wax, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Sorbitan Palmitate, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Propylene Carbonate, Tocopherol, Lecithin, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Glyceryl Stearate, Glyceryl Oleate, Citric Acid, Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides).

description_en:
**Essence Hydro Hero Primer** is the perfect product to prep your skin before applying foundation. â­ **Essence Hydro Hero Primer** creates the perfect base for makeup application, leaving your skin smooth and flawless. â­ Its formula, enriched with hyaluronic acid and cucumber extract, hydrates your skin for up to 48 hours. â­ Provides a refreshing and rejuvenating sensation. â­ Lightweight and easily absorbed formula. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Hydro Hero Primer**: â­ Apply an adequate amount of **Essence Hydro Hero Primer** onto your skin before applying foundation. â­ Gently massage until fully absorbed. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Hydro Hero Primer**: â­ AQUA (WATER), SILICA, DICAPRYLYL CARBONATE, COCO-CAPRYLATE/CAPRATE, GLYCERIN, CETEARYL OLIVATE, DIMETHICONE, ISOAMYL LAURATE, NIACINAMIDE, PENTYLENE GLYCOL, SORBITAN OLIVATE, XYLITYLGLUCOSIDE, CUCUMIS SATIVUS (CUCUMBER) JUICELIT, PANTHENOL, SODIUM HYALURONATE, ANHYDROXYOL PROPYLENE GLYCOL, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, XYLITOL, ALLANTOIN, BETAINE, COCOS NUCIFERA (COCONUT) FRUIT JUICE, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, SODIUM SULPHITE, LACTIC ACID, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, PHOSPHORIC ACID, CITRIC ACID, PHENOXYETHANOL, SODIUM BENZOATE, POTASSIUM SORBATE, PERFUME (FRAGRANCE).

description_en:
**Essence Inner Eye Brightening Pen 01- Nude** is the perfect eyeliner to highlight your eye beauty. It gives you a smooth and shiny finish that lasts long. â­ Easy to use and provides a delicate line. â­ Ideal for creating a natural or bold eye look. â­ Gives your eyes brightness and freshness. â­ Universal pale pink color that suits all skin tones. â­ Its creamy texture glides smoothly on the eyelids. â­ Waterproof and long-lasting. â­ Suitable for all skin types. â­ Gives your eyes a natural glow. â­ Perfect for everyday use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Inner Eye Brightening Pen 01- Nude**:
â­ Use the brush tip gently to draw a delicate line along the lash line from the inner to the outer corner. 
â­ For a cat-eye look, draw an outer line from the outer corner and fill in the inside.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Inner Eye Brightening Pen 01- Nude**:
â­ Hydrogenated coco-glycerides, ozokerite, octyldodecanol, trimyristin, hydrogenated castor oil, butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter, jojoba esters, hydrogenated soybean oil, tocopherol, silica, caprylyl glycol, pentaerythrityl tetra-di-t-butyl hydroxyhydrocinnamate, ci 77491 (iron oxides), ci 77492 (iron oxides), ci 77891 (titanium dioxide).

description_en:
**Essence Get Big! Lashes Volume Curl Mascara- Black** delivers volume and density for a spectacular lash look. â­ Mega brush reaches even the tiniest lashes, coating each one without clumping or weighing them down. â­ Easy and quick application for a breathtaking look. â­ Ophthalmologically tested.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Get Big! Lashes Volume Curl Mascara- Black**:
â­ Start at the base of the lash line. â­ Wiggle the wand back and forth. â­ Add as many coats as desired to achieve the length and volume you want.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Get Big! Lashes Volume Curl Mascara- Black**:
â­ aqua (water) â­ cera alba (beeswax) â­ nylon-12 â­ euphorbia cerifera (candelilla) wax â­ glyceryl stearate â­ decyl olivate â­ hydrogenated olive oil stearyl esters â­ stearic acid â­ copernicia cerifera (carnauba) wax â­ palmitic acid â­ tocopherol â­ pvp â­ hydroxyethylcellulose â­ polyquaternium-10 â­ allantoin â­ ethylhexylglycerin â­ tbhq â­ tetrasodium edta â­ sodium nitrate â­ aminomethyl propanol â­ sodium hydroxide â­ phenoxyethanol â­ potassium sorbate â­ ci 77499 (iron oxides).

**Essence Fix And Last 18h Make-Up Fix. Spr.** is a fantastic setting spray with cucumber extract. â­ Protects and maintains your makeup for up to 18 hours. â­ Provides a natural, matte finish. â­ Waterproof formula. â­ Alcohol-free. â­ Gentle on the skin. â­ Absorbs quickly.

description_en:
**Essence Love That Glow & Bronze Palette**, a versatile palette combining highlighter and bronzer for a radiant and fresh look. â­ Easy to use, perfect for beginners and professionals. â­ Silky-soft, highly pigmented formula. â­ Three harmonious colors to highlight the beauty of your facial features. â­ Suitable for all skin tones. â­ The perfect blend of highlighter and bronzer for a naturally radiant look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Love That Glow & Bronze Palette**:
â­ Apply the highlighter to your cheekbones, bridge of the nose, and cupid's bow to add a touch of radiance. â­ Use the bronzer to define your facial features, applying it to the sides of your nose, cheekbones, and around the perimeter of your face. â­ You can mix the colors together to create a customized look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Love That Glow & Bronze Palette**:
â­ MICA, MAGNESIUM MYRISTATE, MAGNESIUM STEARATE, ISONONYL ISONONANOATE, OCTYLDODECANOL, TRIDECYL TRIMELLITATE, SUCROSE ACETATE ISOBUTYRATE, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, PHENOXYETHANOL, TIN OXIDE, CI 77491, CI 77492 (IRON OXIDES), CI 77891 (TITANIUM DIOXIDE).

description_en:
**Essence Skin Lovin' Sensitive Concealer**, the perfect choice for a flawless complexion. This concealer effortlessly hides blemishes, redness, and under-eye circles. Its lightweight, non-comedogenic formula is barely noticeable and nourishes the skin with moisturizing aloe vera. You can build the coverage from medium to high, depending on your preference.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Skin Lovin' Sensitive Concealer**:
â­ Apply the concealer to dark circles, blemishes, or any other imperfections using the applicator.
â­ Gently blend using a makeup sponge or brush.
â­ Set with powder if desired.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Skin Lovin' Sensitive Concealer**:
â­ Aqua (water), isononyl isononanoate, coconut alkanes, glycerin, triethylhexanoin, magnesium sulfate, polyglyceryl-4 diisostearate/polyhydroxystearate/sebacate, diisostearoyl polyglyceryl-3 dimer dilinoleate, disteardimonium hectorite, aloe barbadensis leaf juice, stearoyl inulin, propylene carbonate, ethylhexylglycerin, hydrogenated lecithin, magnesium oxide, aluminum hydroxide, alumina, phenoxyethanol, potassium sorbate, sodium benzoate, ci 77491 (iron oxides), ci 77492 (iron oxides), ci 77499 (iron oxides), ci 77891 (titanium dioxide).

description_en:
**Essence Dip Eyeliner Waterproof 24h Long-Lasting 01** provides up to 24 hours of on-point eyeliner with its deep black, waterproof formulation! With its softer applicator, it ensures a pleasant, light application. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Dip Eyeliner Waterproof 24h Long-Lasting 01**:
â­ Apply a suitable amount of **Essence Dip Eyeliner Waterproof 24h Long-Lasting 01** to your upper or lower lash line.
â­ Start from the inner corner of your eye and move towards the outer corner.
â­ Use a gentle makeup remover to remove.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Dip Eyeliner Waterproof 24h Long-Lasting 01**:
â­ AQUA (WATER)
â­ PROPANEDIOL
â­ AMMONIUM ACRYLATES COPOLYMER
â­ GLYCERYL ROSINATE
â­ ACRYLATES/ETHYLHEXYL ACRYLATE COPOLYMER
â­ PVP
â­ METHYLPROPANEDIOL
â­ XANTHAN GUM
â­ ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN
â­ SIMETHICONE
â­ CAPRYLYL GLYCOL
â­ PHENYLPROPANOL
â­ CELLULOSE
â­ SODIUM SULFATE
â­ PHENOXYETHANOL
â­ SODIUM DEHYDROACETATE
â­ CI 77266 (BLACK 2) (NANO)
â­ CI 77499 (IRON OXIDES).

**Essence French Manicure Tip Painter 01** delivers the perfect French manicure look. Its long, delicate nail art brush allows for precise and clean application of white nail tips.  **Essence French Manicure Tip Painter 01** boasts a fast drying time and optimal coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence French Manicure Tip Painter 01**:
â­ Apply a thin coat of **Essence French Manicure Tip Painter 01** to your nail tips.
â­ Allow to dry completely before applying a second coat if needed.

â­ Ethyl Acetate

The formula ensures noticeably stronger, harder nails â€“ the polish can be applied twice a week as a cure for soft fingernails that are prone to chipping. â­In an external study, 90% of test subjects confirmed stronger nails after two weeks of use (self-assessment of 50 women).

**Essence 8h Matte Liquid Lipstick 05** offers a long-lasting matte finish in a beautiful pink shade. It provides great coverage and instant color payoff without smudging.  The waterproof and kiss-proof finish lasts up to 8 hours. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence 8h Matte Liquid Lipstick 05**: 
â­ Apply a thin layer of **Essence 8h Matte Liquid Lipstick 05** to your lips. 
â­ Allow it to dry completely before applying any other products.

description_en:
**Essence 8h Matte Liquid Lipstick 07** is a luxurious liquid lipstick in a rich, classic red shade. It features a long-lasting matte finish that lasts up to 8 hours. It gives your lips amazing coverage and intense color without drying them out. Its formula is waterproof and smudge-proof, ensuring color stays put all day long. Thanks to its innovative applicator, itâ€™s easy to apply precisely.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence 8h Matte Liquid Lipstick 07**:
â­ Apply a thin layer of **Essence 8h Matte Liquid Lipstick 07** to your lips.
â­ Let it dry slightly before applying a second coat if desired.
â­ Avoid touching your lips until it is completely dry.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence 8h Matte Liquid Lipstick 07**:
â­ Isododecane, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Octyldodecanol, Dimethicone, Tribehenin, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Silica, Mica, Kaolin, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Talc, Diisostearyl Malate, Propylene Carbonate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Parfum (Fragrance), Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake), Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides).

description_en:
**Essence I Love Extreme Extreme Volume Mascara Waterproof- Black**, for dramatic, long-lasting lashes! This waterproof mascara is perfect for a stunning look that lasts all day. â­ Provides extreme volume and length to your lashes. â­ Waterproof formula, perfect for sports and swimming. â­ Large brush easily coats every lash. â­ Rich, deep black color. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence I Love Extreme Volume Mascara Waterproof- Black**: 
â­ Start at the base of the lash line. 
â­ Wiggle the wand back and forth. 
â­ Add multiple coats as desired to achieve desired length and volume.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence I Love Extreme Volume Mascara Waterproof- Black**:
â­ Aqua (water), carnauba (copernicia cerifera) wax, cera alba (beeswax), butylene glycol, stearic acid, vp/eicosene copolymer, palmitic acid, polybutene, glyceryl stearate, acacia senegal gum, candelilla (euphorbia cerifera) wax, pvp, caprylyl glycol, polyvinyl alcohol, aminomethyl propanol, sodium dehydroacetate, phenoxyethanol, ci 77499 (iron oxides).
