description_en:
**Essence 8h Matte Liquid Lipstick 02** - Indulge your lips in this luxurious muted reddish-brown liquid lipstick. Experience a flawless matte finish that lasts up to 8 hours. Its rich formula delivers high coverage, intense color payoff, and is waterproof and kiss-proof. Effortless application thanks to the specially designed applicator. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence 8h Matte Liquid Lipstick 02**:
â­ Apply a thin layer of **Essence 8h Matte Liquid Lipstick 02** to your lips.
â­ Allow it to dry completely before applying any other makeup.
â­ To remove **Essence 8h Matte Liquid Lipstick 02**, use a suitable makeup remover.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence 8h Matte Liquid Lipstick 02**:
â­ Isododecane, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Octyldodecanol, Dimethicone, Tribehenin, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Silica, Mica, Kaolin, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Talc, Diisostearyl Malate, Propylene Carbonate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Parfum (Fragrance), Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake), Ci 42090 (Blue 1 Lake), Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide).

description_en:
**Essence 8h Matte Comfort Lipliner 07** is a high-precision lip pencil, perfect for drawing a precise and natural lip contour. It features a comfortable and smooth texture, with a long-lasting hold of up to 8 hours. â­ Waterproof. â­ Smooth and safe formula. â­ Provides a pleasant feeling of comfort. â­ Can be used to define or fully color the lips.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence 8h Matte Comfort Lipliner 07**:
â­ Ensure the tip of your pencil is well-moisturized. 
â­ Draw a line from the center of your upper lip towards the corners, following your natural lip line. 
â­ Apply lipstick using a brush.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence 8h Matte Comfort Lipliner 07**:
â­ METHYL TRIMETHICONE â­ ORYZA SATIVA (RICE) BRAN WAX â­ TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE â­ OCTYLDODECANOL â­ SYNTHETIC FLUORPHLOGOPITE â­ ACRYLATES/DIMETHICONE COPOLYMER â­ PERSEA GRATISSIMA (AVOCADO) OIL â­ TOCOPHERYL ACETATE â­ DISTEARDIMONIUM HECTORITE â­ PENTAERYTHRITYL TETRA-DI-T-BUTYL HYDROXYHYDROCINNAMATE â­ PARFUM (FRAGRANCE) â­ CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 (IRON OXIDES) â­ CI 77891 (TITANIUM DIOXIDE).

description_en:
**Essence The Grow'N'Glow Nail Care Polish**: Achieve long, healthy nails with our nourishing and protective nail polish.  Say goodbye to chipping and breakage!  This amazing polish nourishes and protects your nails, promoting natural growth. It features a translucent, light pink tint and a long-lasting, high-shine effect. â­  Gives you long, well-groomed nails. â­ Protects from chipping thanks to its nourishing formula. â­ Soft pink tint & natural finish with a high-shine effect. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence The Grow'N'Glow Nail Care Polish**: â­ Apply 3 times per week. â­ Protects the nail surface to support longer natural nail growth. â­ 94% confirm stronger nails (Self-assessment of 50 women after 30 days of use).

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence The Grow'N'Glow Nail Care Polish**: â­ Ethyl Acetate, â­ Butyl Acetate, â­ Nitrocellulose, â­ Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer, â­ Dipropylene Glycol Dibenzoate, â­ Isopropyl Alcohol, â­ Acrylates Copolymer, â­ Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, â­ Apium Graveolens (Celery) Seed Extract, â­ Tocopherol, â­ Barium Sulfate, â­ Ci 15850 (Red 6), â­ Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake).

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Lash Princess Liner Black Waterproof**:

**Essence 8h Matte Comfort Lipliner 02** is a high-precision lip pencil that allows you to draw the perfect lip contour. It features a comfortable and smooth texture that lasts up to 8 hours. â­ Waterproof, ensuring color stays all day long. â­ Safe formula, providing a pleasant sensation on your lips. â­ Can be used to define the lip line or to color the entire lip. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence 8h Matte Comfort Lipliner 02**: 
â­ Ensure the pencil tip is well-moisturized before use. 
â­ Draw a line from the center of your upper lip towards the corners, following your natural lip line. 
â­ Apply lipstick afterward, preferably using a brush. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence 8h Matte Comfort Lipliner 02**: 
â­ METHYL TRIMETHICONE â­ ORYZA SATIVA (RICE) BRAN WAX â­ TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE â­ OCTYLDODECANOL â­ SYNTHETIC FLUORPHLOGOPITE â­ ACRYLATES/DIMETHICONE COPOLYMER â­ PERSEA GRATISSIMA (AVOCADO) OIL â­ TOCOPHERYL ACETATE â­ DISTEARDIMONIUM HECTORITE â­ PENTAERYTHRITYL TETRA-DI-T-BUTYL HYDROXYHYDROCINNAMATE â­ PARAHYDROXYBENZOATE â­ CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 (IRON OXIDES) â­ CI 77891 (TITANIUM DIOXIDE).

description_en:
**Essence 8h Matte Liquid Lipstick 10** is a richly pigmented liquid lipstick with a stunning long-lasting matte finish. It gives your lips a beautiful smooth, warm red color without drying them out.  Its unique formula offers great coverage and instant color that's smudge-proof. Stays put for up to 8 hours!  The innovative applicator makes application easy and precise. Keep your lips looking gorgeous all day long with **Essence 8h Matte Liquid Lipstick 10**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence 8h Matte Liquid Lipstick 10**
â­ Apply a thin layer of **Essence 8h Matte Liquid Lipstick 10** to your lips.
â­ Allow to dry for a few seconds.
â­ For a more intense look, apply a second layer.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence 8h Matte Liquid Lipstick 10**
â­ Isododecane, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Octyldodecanol, Dimethicone, Tribehenin, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Silica, Mica, Kaolin, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Talc, Diisostearyl Malate, Propylene Carbonate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Parfum (Fragrance), Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake), Ci 42090 (Blue 1 Lake), Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide).

**Essence 8h Matte Liquid Lipstick 12** offers high coverage and a long-lasting matte finish in a warm peachy pink shade.  Get intense color that lasts up to 8 hours without drying your lips. Its rich formula provides great coverage and instant color payoff, resisting smudging, water, and kisses.  It comes with an easy-to-use applicator for precise application.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence 8h Matte Liquid Lipstick 12**:
â­ Apply one or more coats as desired.
â­ Start from the center and work your way outwards.
â­ Let it dry before applying another coat.

â­ Isododecane, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Octyldodecanol, Dimethicone, Tribehenin, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Silica, Mica, Kaolin, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Talc, Diisostearyl Malate, Propylene Carbonate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Parfum (Fragrance), Ci 15850 (Red 6), Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake), Ci 42090 (Blue 1 Lake), Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide).

**Essence Lash Like A Boss** Instant Lift & Curl Mascara delivers long, curled lashes effortlessly. Its specially curved elastomer brush lifts and curls your lashes for visibly larger, more open eyes.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Lash Like A Boss** Instant Lift & Curl Mascara:

â­ Aqua (Water) â­ Glyceryl Stearate â­ Synthetic Beeswax â­ Copernicia Cerifera Cera (Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax) â­ Stearic Acid â­ Glycerin â­ Palmitic Acid â­ Acrylates Copolymer â­ Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter â­ Butylene Glycol â­ Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil â­ Panthenol â­ Caprylyl Glycol â­ Hydroxyethylcellulose â­ Talc â­ PVP â­ Cellulose â­ Kaolin â­ Isostearyl Sebacate â­ Disodium Phosphate â­ Polysorbate 60 â­ Disodium Stearoyl Glutamate â­ Sodium Phosphate â­ Aluminum Hydroxide â­ Sodium Hydroxide â­ Phenoxyethanol â­ Sodium Dehydroacetate â­ Potassium Sorbate â­ CI 77007 (Ultramarines) â­ CI 77266 (Black 2) (Nano) â­ CI 77499 (Iron Oxides).

title_ar: **Ø§ÙŠØ³Ù†Ø³ Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø§Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± Ø¬Ù„ 62**
description_en:
**Essence Gel Nail Colour 62**, a quick-drying nail polish for a high-gloss gel finish. Clean beauty with WOW performance! There's no compromise with the gel nail colour nail polishes: they are easy to apply thanks to the patented, broad "double-touch" brush and dry extremely quickly in just 40 seconds. The long-lasting gel finish and the wide range of colours leave nothing to be desired. And all of this in a vegan, clean beauty formula with a short list of ingredients and no microplastic particles! The **Essence Gel Nail Colour 62** is also climate neutral thanks to CO2 compensation.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Gel Nail Colour 62**
â­ Apply a thin coat of **Essence Gel Nail Colour 62** to your nails.
â­ Let it dry for 40 seconds.
â­ You can add a second coat for more intense colour.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Gel Nail Colour 62**
â­ ETHYL ACETATE
â­ BUTYL ACETATE
â­ NITROCELLULOSE
â­ DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL DIBENZOATE
â­ ISOPROPYL ALCOHOL
â­ ADIPIC ACID/NEOPENTYL GLYCOL/TRIMELLITIC ANHYDRIDE COPOLYMER
â­ MICA
â­ ACRYLATES COPOLYMER
â­ ADIPIC ACID/FUMARIC ACID/TRICYCLODECANE DIMETHANOL COPOLYMER
â­ STEARALKONIUM BENTONITE
â­ DIACETONE ALCOHOL
â­ SUCROSE ACETATE ISOBUTYRATE
â­ SILICA
â­ MALTOL
â­ PENTAERYTHRITYL TETRAISOSTEARATE
â­ TRIETHOXYCAPRYLYLSILANE
â­ PHOSPHORIC ACID
â­ TIN OXIDE
â­ CI 77491 (IRON OXIDES)
â­ CI 77492 (IRON OXIDES)
â­ CI 77499 (IRON OXIDES)
â­ CI 77891 (TITANIUM DIOXIDE).

**Essence 8h Matte Comfort Lipliner 01** is a high-quality lip pencil that allows you to draw the lip contour precisely and easily. â­ Long-lasting up to 8 hours. â­ Waterproof. â­ Smooth and safe formula. â­ Leaves a pleasant sensation on the lips. â­ Can also be used to color the entire lip surface. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence 8h Matte Comfort Lipliner 01**: 
â­ Ensure the pencil tip is well-moisturized. â­ Draw a line from the center of your upper lip to the corners, following your natural lip line. â­ Apply your lipstick afterwards, preferably with a brush.

â­ METHYL TRIMETHICONE â­ ORYZA SATIVA (RICE) BRAN WAX â­ TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE â­ OCTYLDODECANOL â­ SYNTHETIC FLUORPHLOGOPITE â­ ACRYLATES/DIMETHICONE COPOLYMER â­ PERSEA GRATISSIMA (AVOCADO) OIL â­ TOCOPHERYL ACETATE â­ DISTEARDIMONIUM HECTORITE â­ PENTAERYTHRITYL TETRA-DI-T-BUTYL HYDROXYHYDROCINNAMATE â­ PARFUM (FRAGRANCE) â­ CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 (IRON OXIDES) â­ CI 77891 (TITANIUM DIOXIDE).

**Essence Stay & Play Gel Eyeliner 03** delivers intense color and a captivating look. Its smooth, creamy texture glides effortlessly onto the lids, allowing for precise and bold lines. Enjoy long-lasting color that stays put for up to 16 hours! 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Stay & Play Gel Eyeliner 03**: 
â­ Apply a thin or thick line along your upper or lower lash line. 
â­ Let it dry before applying mascara. 
â­ To remove **Essence Stay & Play Gel Eyeliner 03**, use a gentle makeup remover. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Stay & Play Gel Eyeliner 03**: 
â­ Isododecane, Synthetic Wax, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Dimethicone, Polybutene, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Polyglyceryl-4 Diisostearate/Polyhydroxystearate/Sebacate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Mica, Propylene Carbonate, Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide).

It features a heart-shaped core and a captivating fruity fragrance. â­ Nourishes and moisturizes with 10% sweet almond oil. â­ Provides a subtle pink or red tint depending on your natural lip color. â­ Adds a charming shine. â­ Playful heart-shaped design. â­ Fresh fruity scent. â­ Vegan and cruelty-free. â­ Free from gluten, parabens, and microplastic particles. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Heart Core Fruity Lip Balm 02**: â­ Swipe the balm across your lips as needed. â­ Reapply throughout the day for lasting hydration.

description_en:
**Essence Camouflage Matt Concealer 23** is a waterproof concealer that mattifies the skin and effectively covers dark circles and shadows under the eyes thanks to its high coverage. It can even temporarily conceal tattoos.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Camouflage Matt Concealer 23**:
â­ Can be used on uneven skin before or after foundation.
â­ Also suitable for contouring: apply a shade lighter than your skin tone to the forehead, chin, and bridge of the nose.
â­ To conceal dark circles: apply a small amount under the eye in an inverted triangle shape and blend.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Camouflage Matt Concealer 23**:
â­ AQUA (WATER)
â­ CYCLOPENTASILOXANE
â­ ISODODECANE
â­ TALC
â­ HYDROGENATED POLYISOBUTENE
â­ ALUMINUM STARCH OCTENYLSUCCINATE
â­ GLYCERIN
â­ POLYGLYCERYL-4 ISOSTEARATE
â­ CETYL PEG/PPG-10/1 DIMETHICONE
â­ HEXYL LAURATE
â­ CYCLOHEXASILOXANE
â­ POTASSIUM CETYL PHOSHLIDE
â­ TOCOPHEROL
â­ SODIUM COROL /PPG-19/19 DIMETHICONE
â­ CERA ALBA (BEESWAX)
â­ DISODIUM EDTA
â­ XANTHAN GUM
â­ ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN
â­ BHT
â­ TRIETHOXYCAPRYLYLSILANE
â­ ALUMINUM/MAGNESIUM HYDROXIDE STEARATE
â­ PHENOXYETHANOL
â­ PERFUME (FRAGRANCE)
â­ CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 (IRON OXIDES)
â­ CI 77891 (TITANIUM DIOXIDE).

description_en:
**Essence 8h Matte Liquid Lipstick 11**, a long-lasting matte liquid lipstick in a warm berry shade. **Essence 8h Matte Liquid Lipstick 11** gives lips a matte finish in a subtle, warm berry shade without drying them out. description_en:
**Essence Poreless Partner Primer**: Perfectly prepares your skin for foundation application, leaving it smoother and more radiant.  It contains niacinamide to refine skin and tighten pores, while providing a matte finish.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Poreless Partner Primer**: 
â­ Apply a small amount of **Essence Poreless Partner Primer** to your skin before applying foundation.
â­ Distribute evenly across the face.
â­ Allow to dry before applying makeup.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Poreless Partner Primer**: 
â­ AQUA (WATER) â­ BUTYLENE GLYCOL â­ CELLULOSE â­ NIACINAMIDE â­ PROPANEDIOL â­ PENTYLENE GLYCOL â­ SODIUM POLYACRYLATE STARCH â­ PANTHENOL â­ ENANTIA CHLORANTHA BARK EXTRACT â­ CAPRYLYL GLYCOL â­ ALLANTOIN â­ BETAINE â­ OLEANOLIC ACID â­ LACTIC ACID â­ SODIUM HYDROXIDE â­ CITRIC ACID â­ BENZYL ALCOHOL â­ BENZOIC ACID â­ PARFUM (FRAGRANCE) â­ CI 42090 (BLUE 1) â­ CI 45410 (RED 28).

description_en:
**Essence 16h Cover & Last Powder Foundation 05 - Nude**: This lightweight powder foundation provides a refreshing feel with high coverage, is waterproof, transfer-proof, and lasts up to 16 hours. It's free of silicones, parabens, mineral oil, and microplastic particles. Get a matte, flawless finish! 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence 16h Cover & Last Powder Foundation 05 - Nude**: 
â­ Apply the foundation to clean, moisturized skin using a brush or the included sponge. 
â­ Blend evenly for desired coverage. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence 16h Cover & Last Powder Foundation 05 - Nude**: 
â­ Mica, Kaolin, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, Shea Butter Ethyl Esters, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Macadamia Integrifolia/Tetraphylla Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, P-Anisic Acid, Magnolia Officinalis Bark Extract, Magnesium Oxide, Alumina, Citric Acid, CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 (Iron Oxides), CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide).

description_en:
**Essence Mattifying Compact Powder 11- Nude** delivers a naturally matte complexion. Its delicate, powdery texture spreads smoothly for a flawless, natural-looking finish.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Mattifying Compact Powder 11- Nude**:
â­ Dip the included brush in the powder and ensure the bristles are evenly coated.
â­ Apply the powder to your T-zone (forehead, nose) first.
â­ Gently dab the brush under your eyes, down your cheeks, and along your jawline.
â­ Use the brush to smooth out any blotches for a seamless finish.
â­ Reapply every few hours as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Mattifying Compact Powder 11- Nude**:
â­ Talc
â­ Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate
â­ Sapphire Powder
â­ Aqua (Water)
â­ Magnesium Stearate
â­ Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride
â­ Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2
â­ Ethylhexyl Palmitate
â­ Caprylyl Glycol
â­ Hexylene Glycol
â­ Phenoxyethanol

description_en:
**Essence Mattifying Compact Powder 04- Nude** gives you a flawless, natural matte finish. This popular powder creates a smooth, even complexion as if applied by a professional makeup artist. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Mattifying Compact Powder 04- Nude**:
â­ Dip the included brush in the powder and ensure bristles are evenly coated.
â­ Gently dab the brush along your T-zone (forehead and nose).
â­ Apply powder under eyes, on cheeks, and along jawline.
â­ Use the brush to smooth the powder for a seamless finish.
â­ Reapply every few hours as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Mattifying Compact Powder 04- Nude**:
â­ Talc
â­ Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate
â­ Sapphire Powder
â­ Aqua (Water)
â­ Magnesium Stearate
â­ Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride
â­ Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2
â­ Ethylhexyl Palmitate
â­ Caprylyl Glycol
â­ Hexylene Glycol
â­ Phenoxyethanol

description_en:
**Essence Extreme Shine Volume Lipgloss 102** is a must-have for gorgeous lips with a wet look â€“ without silicones, microplastic particles, alcohol, and oil. This product offers three benefits: maximum volume, an extreme plumping effect, and a radiant glow. With a cap made of 94% recycled plastic, it saves around 31 tons of new plastic annually. Available in a wide range of colors, from natural to bright.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Extreme Shine Volume Lipgloss 102**:
â­ Apply a suitable amount of **Essence Extreme Shine Volume Lipgloss 102** to your lips.
â­ Distribute the product evenly using your finger or a lip brush.
â­ Reapply as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Extreme Shine Volume Lipgloss 102**:
â­ POLYBUTENE, HYDROGENATED POLYISOBUTENE, OCTYLDODECANOL, SILICA DIMETHYL SILYLATE, TRIMETHYLOLPROPANE TRIISOSTEARATE, HYDROGENATED STYRENE/ISOPRENE COPOLYMER, CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, MENTHOL, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, BENZYL NICOTINATE, SYNTHETIC FLUORPHLOGOPITE, OCTYLDODECYL STEAROYL STEARATE, MICA, BARIUM SULFATE, VP/HEXADECENE COPOLYMER, AROMA (FLAVOR), CI 15850 (RED 6), CI 15850 (RED 7 LAKE), CI 42090 (BLUE 1 LAKE), CI 77491 (IRON OXIDES), CI 77891 (TITANIUM DIOXIDE).

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence I Love Flawless Skin Foundation 30**:
â­ Shake well before use.

**Essence Thick & Wow! Fixing Brow Mascara 03** is the perfect eyebrow mascara for styling, setting, and filling in your brows. â­  A fiber-rich formula for visibly fuller and thicker eyebrows. â­ Easy to apply thanks to its integrated brush. â­ Perfect for your handbag. â­ Natural color that suits all skin tones. â­ Long-lasting effect. â­ Gives you naturally thick and beautiful eyebrows. â­ Ideal for everyday use. â­ Suitable for all skin types. â­ Lightweight and easy to carry. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Thick & Wow! Fixing Brow Mascara 03**: â­ Apply a small amount to the mascara brush. â­ Gently comb your eyebrows from the inside out. â­ Let it dry before applying any other products. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Thick & Wow! Fixing Brow Mascara 03**: â­ Isododecane, â­ Dimethicone, â­ Trimethylsiloxysilicate, â­ Trihydroxystearin, â­ C24-28 Alkyldimethylsiloxy Trimethylsiloxysilicate, â­ Disteardimonium Hectorite, â­ Silica Dimethyl Silylate, â­ Propylene Carbonate, â­ Cellulose, â­ Caprylyl Glycol, â­ Hexylene Glycol, â­ Phenoxyethanol, â­ Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), â­ Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides), â­ Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), â­ Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide).

description_en:
**Essence Stay & Play Gel Eyeliner 06** delivers intense color payoff and a long-lasting, smudge-proof finish. Its smooth, gel-like texture glides effortlessly across the lids, creating precise lines with ease. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Stay & Play Gel Eyeliner 06**:
â­ Apply a small amount of product to the eyelid.
â­ Use an angled brush to create thin or thick lines as desired.
â­ Allow to dry completely before applying other makeup.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Stay & Play Gel Eyeliner 06**:
â­ Isododecane, Synthetic Wax, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Dimethicone, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Polybutene, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Mica, Polyglyceryl-4 Diisostearate/Polyhydroxystearate/Sebacate, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Propylene Carbonate, Tin Oxide, Magnesium Oxide, Alumina, Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77510 (Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide).

description_en:
**Essence 16h Cover & Last Powder Foundation 04 - Nude** offers exceptional performance. Its lightweight texture feels fresh, provides high coverage, is waterproof, and lasts up to 16 hours.  It's also free of silicones, parabens, mineral oil, and microplastic particles. For a flawless, matte finish!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence 16h Cover & Last Powder Foundation 04 - Nude**:
â­ Apply the powder to clean, moisturized skin using a brush or the included sponge.
â­ Blend evenly for desired coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence 16h Cover & Last Powder Foundation 04 - Nude**:
â­ Mica, Kaolin, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, Shea Butter Ethyl Esters, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Macadamia Integrifolia/Tetraphylla Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, P-Anisic Acid, Magnolia Officinalis Bark Extract, Magnesium Oxide, Alumina, Citric Acid, CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 (Iron Oxides), CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide).

description_en:
**Essence Gel Nail Colour 51**:  Fast-drying nail polish for a high-shine gel finish. Clean beauty with a WOW performance! Vegan formula, free of microplastic particles. Easy application with a wide brush, and dries quickly. One coat is ready to shine in just 40 seconds. Stunning colors for every taste. The more layers you apply, the more intense the color result.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Gel Nail Colour 51**: â­Apply two coats on top of a base coat, then seal with a top coat for a professional look. â­Drying time increases with more coats, but can be shortened using a Dry Spray or Drying Drops.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Gel Nail Colour 51**: â­Ethyl Acetate, Butyl Acetate, Nitrocellulose, Dipropylene Glycol Dibenzoate, Isopropyl Alcohol, Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer, Acrylates Copolymer, Adipic Acid/Fumaric Acid/Tricyclodecane Dimethanol Copolymer, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Diacetone Alcohol, Sucrose Acetate Isobutyrate, Silica, Maltol, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Aluminum Hydroxide, Phosphoric Acid, Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake), Ci 77007 (Ultramarines), Ci 77510 (Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide).

title_ar: **Ø§ÙŠØ³Ù†Ø³ ÙƒÙˆÙ†Ø³ÙŠÙ„Ø± Ù…Ø§Ù„ØªÙŠ ØªØ§Ø³Ùƒ 20**
description_en:
**Essence Multitask Concealer 20** is a multi-tasking stick concealer with different shades to contour, highlight, and conceal in one product.  It features a texture enriched with hyaluronic acid and caffeine, offering buildable medium to high coverage with a natural matte finish that lasts.  It optically erases dark circles, covers imperfections, and provides flawless coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Multitask Concealer 20**:
â­ Apply the concealer after foundation.
â­ Blend gently using your fingers or a brush.
â­ Build up coverage as needed for more intensity.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Multitask Concealer 20**:
â­Aqua (Water), Talc, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Isododecane, Polyglyceryl-4 Isostearate, Glycerin, C13-15 Alkane, Sucrose Acetate Isobutyrate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Polyglyceryl-4 Oleate, Diatomaceous Earth, Magnesium Sulfate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Tocopherol, Hyaluronic Acid, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Sodium Hyaluronate, Polyglyceryl-3 Polyricinoleate, Paullinia Cupana Seed Extract, Propanediol, Lysine, Hydrolyzed Glycosaminoglycans, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Lauroyl Glutamate, Caffeine, Magnesium Chloride, Beta-Sitosterol, Squalene, Phenoxyethanol, Aluminum Hydroxide, Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide).

**Essence I Love Flawless Skin Foundation 60** provides high coverage for a natural, matte finish. Despite its lightweight texture, it offers full opacity. It stays on longer, protects your skin with SPF 20, and won't clog pores.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence I Love Flawless Skin Foundation 60**:
â­ Shake well before use.

description_en:
**Essence Stay & Play Gel Eyeliner 01** delivers intense colour and long-lasting wear. Its smooth, gel-like texture glides effortlessly onto the lids, providing a rich, highly-pigmented finish that lasts up to 16 hours.  With **Essence Stay & Play Gel Eyeliner 01**, creating expressive eye looks has never been easier.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Stay & Play Gel Eyeliner 01**:
â­ Apply a small amount of product to your eyelid.
â­ Use a thin brush for precise application.
â­ Experiment with different eyeliner styles.
â­ Easily removed with a suitable makeup remover.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Stay & Play Gel Eyeliner 01**:
â­ Isododecane
â­ Trimethylsiloxysilicate
â­ Synthetic Wax
â­ Dimethicone
â­ Polybutene
â­ Synthetic Fluorphlogopite
â­ Polyglyceryl-4 Diisostearate/Polyhydroxystearate/Sebacate
â­ Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride

â­ Propylene Carbonate
â­ Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides)
â­ Ci 77510 (Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide).

**Essence Gel Nail Colour 57** -  Fast-drying nail polish for a high-shine gel finish. Clean beauty with a WOW performance! Vegan formula, free of microplastic particles.  Easy-to-apply broad brush, dries quickly. Ready to shine in just 40 seconds.  Beautiful colors for every taste. The more layers, the more intense the color result.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Gel Nail Colour 57**:
â­ Apply a base coat.
â­ Apply two coats of **Essence Gel Nail Colour 57**.
â­ Seal with a topcoat.
â­ Drying time increases with more coats;  use a drying spray or drops to speed up drying.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Gel Nail Colour 57**:
â­ Ethyl Acetate
â­ Butyl Acetate

â­ Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer

**Essence Bloom Baby, Bloom! Eye & Face Palette 01** is the perfect eyeshadow and face palette for a complete look, with an integrated mirror for easy touch-ups on the go. â­ Four highly pigmented eyeshadows create natural eye looks. â­ Highlighter, blush, and bronzer with silky-soft textures create a fresh complexion. â­ This all-in-one palette combines 4 highly pigmented eyeshadow shades with 3 glowing face textures for a complete look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Bloom Baby, Bloom! Eye & Face Palette 01**: â­ Use a suitable eyeshadow brush to apply the shadows. â­ Apply highlighter to cheekbones, bridge of nose, and cupid's bow. â­ Apply blush to the apples of your cheeks. â­ Apply bronzer around the perimeter of your face.

**Essence I Love Flawless Skin Foundation 50** provides high coverage for a flawless, radiant complexion. It gives you a natural, matte finish despite its lightweight texture.  The unique formula doesn't clog pores, stays on longer, and offers SPF 20 sun protection.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence I Love Flawless Skin Foundation 50**:
â­ Shake well before use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence I Love Flawless Skin Foundation 50**:
â­ Aqua (Water), Isododecane, Dimethicone, Talc, Zinc Oxide, Cetyl Peg/Ppg-10/1 Dimethicone, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Hydrogenated Polydecene, Glycerin, Sodium Chloride, Hydrogen Dimethicone, Magnesium Sulfate, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Ethylene Brassylate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Methicone, Propylene Carbonate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Potassium Sorbate, Benzoic Acid, Dehydroacetic Acid, Aluminum Hydroxide, Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide).

description_en:
**Essence Hello, Good Stuff! Pore Minimizing Serum** is a luxurious serum designed to visibly reduce the appearance of enlarged pores while providing essential hydration. Its unique formula, rich in effective natural ingredients, works to refine and improve skin texture, leaving you with a radiant and healthy complexion. It absorbs quickly without leaving any greasy residue and is suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Hello, Good Stuff! Pore Minimizing Serum**:
â­ Cleanse your face thoroughly.
â­ Apply a few drops of serum to your palm.
â­ Gently spread the serum across your face and neck, focusing on areas with enlarged pores.
â­ Massage gently until fully absorbed.
â­ Follow with your regular moisturizer.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Hello, Good Stuff! Pore Minimizing Serum**:
â­ Water
â­ Pomegranate
â­ Glycerin (for hydration)
â­ 3% Niacinamide (to minimize pores and improve skin texture)
â­ Plant extracts (for additional nourishment)
â­ Preservatives

description_en:
**Essence Choose Your Glow Highlighter Palette**: Choose your perfect glow with this amazing palette!  **Essence Choose Your Glow Highlighter Palette** features three stunning shades to suit every occasion. â­ The most subtle shade creates a natural everyday look. â­ The bronze shade is ideal for a stunning summer glow on the cheeks. â­ The high-shine nuances are perfect for a radiant party makeup look. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Choose Your Glow Highlighter Palette**: â­ Use a fan brush or your fingertips to apply **Essence Choose Your Glow Highlighter Palette** where the sun naturally hits your face (cheekbones, nose bridge, cupid's bow). â­ Use one shade or a mix of multiple shades to get that perfect glow!

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Choose Your Glow Highlighter Palette**: â­ Ingredients vary per shade. Please refer to the packaging for a full ingredient list for each shade.

description_en:
**Essence Multitask Concealer 15** is a multitasking stick concealer with various shades to contour, highlight, and conceal skin imperfections all in one product. Enriched with hyaluronic acid and caffeine, it provides buildable medium-to-high coverage with a natural, long-lasting matte finish. Perfect for erasing dark circles and covering blemishes. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Multitask Concealer 15**: 
â­ Apply a small amount of product to the areas you want to cover. 
â­ Gently blend using fingertips or a brush. 
â­ Build coverage as needed. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Multitask Concealer 15**: 
â­ Aqua (Water), Talc, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Isododecane, Polyglyceryl-4 Isostearate, Glycerin, C13-15 Alkane, Sucrose Acetate Isobutyrate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Polyglyceryl-4 Oleate, Diatomaceous Earth, Magnesium Sulfate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Tocopherol, Hyaluronic Acid, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Sodium Hyaluronate, Polyglyceryl-3 Polyricinoleate, Paullinia Cupana Seed Extract, Propanediol, Lysine, Hydrolyzed Glycosaminoglycans, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Lauroyl Glutamate, Caffeine, Magnesium Chloride, Beta-Sitosterol, Squalene, Phenoxyethanol, Aluminum Hydroxide, Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide).

**Essence Multitask Concealer 10**, a multi-use stick concealer with various shades to contour, highlight, and conceal skin imperfections all in one product. Enriched with hyaluronic acid and caffeine, it provides buildable medium to high coverage with a natural matte finish that lasts. It erases dark circles, covers blemishes, and gives you a flawless look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Multitask Concealer 10**:
â­ Apply the concealer to areas needing coverage or contouring.
â­ Blend gently using your fingers or a makeup brush.
â­ Use different shades for contouring and highlighting.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Multitask Concealer 10**:
â­Aqua (Water), Talc, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Isododecane, Polyglyceryl-4 Isostearate, Glycerin, C13-15 Alkane, Sucrose Acetate Isobutyrate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Polyglyceryl-4 Oleate, Diatomaceous Earth, Magnesium Sulfate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Tocopherol, Hyaluronic Acid, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Sodium Hyaluronate, Polyglyceryl-3 Polyricinoleate, Paullinia Cupana Seed Extract, Propanediol, Lysine, Hydrolyzed Glycosaminoglycans, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Lauroyl Glutamate, Caffeine, Magnesium Chloride, Beta-Sitosterol, Squalene, Phenoxyethanol, Aluminum Hydroxide, Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide).

description_en:
**Essence 8h Matte Liquid Lipstick 06** is a luxurious liquid lipstick in a cool mauve shade, providing your lips with a long-lasting matte finish.  Its creamy formula offers high coverage and instant color payoff, with a smudge-proof effect. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence 8h Matte Liquid Lipstick 06**:
â­ Apply one or more coats as desired. 
â­ Allow to dry completely before applying any other products. 
â­ To remove, use a suitable makeup remover.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence 8h Matte Liquid Lipstick 06**:
â­ Isododecane, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Octyldodecanol, Dimethicone, Tribehenin, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Silica, Mica, Kaolin, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Talc, Diisostearyl Malate, Propylene Carbonate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Parfum (Fragrance), Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake), Ci 42090 (Blue 1 Lake), Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide).

description_en:
**Essence Gel Nail Colour 59** is a quick-drying nail polish that gives you a high-shine gel finish. Clean beauty with WOW performance! Easy to apply thanks to the patented, broad "double-touch" brush, it dries extremely quickly in just 40 seconds. Long-lasting gel finish and a wide range of colors. Vegan, clean beauty formula with a short list of ingredients and no microplastic particles! Climate neutral thanks to CO2 compensation.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Essence Gel Nail Colour 59**
â­ Apply a thin coat of **Essence Gel Nail Colour 59** to your nails.
â­ Let it dry for 40 seconds.
â­ You can add a second coat for more intense color.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Essence Gel Nail Colour 59**
â­ Ethyl Acetate
